case.state: Let me guess. Multiple hats? You turn every day into April Fools'... It's not April? Village Idiot's Day, then. Wear pants.

Let me guess. Multiple hats? You turn every day into April Fools'... It's not April? Village Idiot's Day, then. Wear pants. And a top.
Let me guess. Multiple hats? You turn every day into April Fools'. April Pervert's, even. Wear pants. And a top.

You call yourself Neptune, and you walk around with your butt naked!? Is this some kind of joke at her expense? I won't deny it's funny, but it's silly and indecent... Get serious and wear pants or something.

Huh?! ...How many rounds have you played already!? ...None?! Then wear something at once, the two of you!

~Player~, your breasts! Do you normally walk around like that?

~Player~, your panties! Your shirt is not long enough to cover them, so wear a skirt or something!
~Player~, your panties! Your tank top is not long enough to cover them, so wear a skirt or something!
~Player~, your panties! Your jacket is not long enough to cover them, so wear a skirt or something!
~Player~, your panties! At least wear a skirt or something!

Uhm... ~Player~, I don't know where to look! Are you OK with baring your chest like that? We're not at a beach...
A male Neptune? What else? Don't tell me you're a god too. Ahaha~
You're such a great fan of my little sister that you even want me to call you by her name? Kimochi warui wa.
Don't impersonate me, "~player~". If you lose, I don't want people to say that they saw Noire naked.
So you go by the name of "Noire", right? In that case, if you want to see "Noire" in the nude, why don't you get naked in front of a mirror instead of playing against me?

With your three sizes, you can't really cosplay as Blanc...

Don't get overconfident, ~player~! You had a once-in-a-million luck back then when you won those bracelets, but I'm still a goddess at games. Wear more if you don't want the game to end in a few rounds.

Okay, ~player~, you won back then, but it's disrespectful to start the game wearing so little, as if you're giving me a handicap. Don't forget I'm a gamer goddess! If anyone needs a handicap, it's still you!

You won back then by sheer luck, and you're already so cocky? ~Player~, if you start so lightly dressed, it'll be a cakewalk for me to beat you, so why don't you borrow a few more accessories from someone before we start?
Thank you, ~player~, that's better! I'm going to make you realize how easily I can defeat you, but it's only fun if you're taking the game seriously!
It was a smart choice, ~player~, to listen to me and return wearing more clothes! Now it'll be slightly more interesting!
Hello, ~player~, thanks for inv-- W-Why is there a naked girl here!?

~Player~! Leaving when I was... f-forfeiting... is hard to forgive! It was really awful! ...I-If you want to play with me again, then at least promise to see it through to the end in case I lose! However improbable it is!

Were you the one who chose this place to play at, Neptune? It's much too purple for my taste.
You really came back wearing more clothes! A wise choice, ~player~!
I see you listened to me and returned wearing more. Thank you for taking the game seriously!
Thank you, ~player~, for returning more completely dressed. That will make the game more interesting for me!
~Player~, you took some clothes off again? Are you doing this only to see my reactions? Wear them again and stop joking.
OK, ~player~, I hope you've finally decided on your clothes. Now, who are we going to play with?
Don't be silly, Neptune. Your nudity is what I care about the least. I'll defeat you anyway, though, fair and square.
Don't be silly, Neptune. I don't care about your nudity. I'll defeat you anyway, though, fair and square.
And why not, Neptune? I'm going to make a hundred friends this year. I'm still kind of... far from the goal, though.

Ahaha! Okaerinasaimase, ~player~! (It'd be so much fun to play strip poker while cosplaying as a maid... a dojikko maid, of course!)

Ahaha! Okaerinasaimase, ~player~! (It'd be so much fun to play strip poker while cosplaying as a maid... a dojikko maid, of course! ...Maybe it'd be even more fun if we both cosplayed, though...)

In your imagination, you could be a goddess's mother? That's awkward for many reasons. Chronologically I'm probably older than you, too.

Hello, ~player~! I really like these thigh-highs, so don't think it'll be easy to make me take them off!

I'm the most gifted of the goddesses, so no wonder you want to become more like me, ~player~, but you should try to emulate my various qualities, not just wear the same accessories.

~Player~, it's fine that you're wearing the bracelets I gave you... but it's kind of embarrassing, too. If anyone asks, we're wearing the same bracelets purely by chance, understood? Don't explain how you got them and what you saw me do before that...

Yes, I do have more of those bracelets, and I'm wearing the same costume again... What about the underwear? ...I'm going to defeat you and make you withdraw so quickly you won't even see if it's the same or not!

Hello, ~player~. I'm ready to start whenever you are. (...I missed such a perfect opportunity for cosplaying. I should have dressed as witch... or a witch's black cat.)

Hello, ~player~. You should know that I don't appreciate silly jokes. I'm hoping for a serious game, even on a day like this.
Hello, ~player~! ...Had I known that we were going to play at a place like this, I'd have prepared a beach outfit too.
Hello, ~player~! ...Do you know why there are so many people in swimwear here?
Is this your private library, ~player~, or someone's from your family? I didn't expect a place like this.

~Player~, I see you're wearing the bracelets I gave you. That's fine, but you should try to emulate my diligence and skill, not just my clothing... What? You won that time, so you think you're skilled at games? That was just a fluke!

~Player~, you had to strip to your underwear last time, and then you withdrew when you lost again! Maybe you were right to do so! You had no chance against me at all!

You saw my strapless underwear last time, didn't even show yours, and then you withdrew? Did you get too embarrassed? You're surprisingly shy for this game, ~player~.

~Player~... I took off my panties for you last time, and you left without even giving me a chance to see your underwear! I-It's okay, but it was like... running away with your victory. A-Actually, that counts as your loss anyway!

You won last time, ~player~, but it was just a fluke! I-I saw you naked too, so it was basically a draw! But don't imagine you'll get this much luck this time!

(I feel a strange affinity with that girl. She might be as popular in her world as I am in mine.)

~Player~, why didn't you tell me about this in advance? I'd have prepared! Not that I particularly wanted to, but now it's... more embarrassing not to be wearing bunny ears!
We're in a perfect place for a gamers' match like this!
I'm not really a student, but I can pretend. Will you pretend to be a student too, ~player~, or a teacher? ...Um... Maybe this isn't the best idea.
How is it possible that you're getting so many people to play here? I better not lose. Especially not in a dirty place like this.
We can still move somewhere else, ~player~.
If it's so dark, then perhaps it'll be less embarrassing for whoever loses.
With so many onlookers around, the number of players is the least problem.
We can still move somewhere else, you know?
No other girls coming? Even if I'm going to win, this will make it slightly awkward for me, don't you think, ~player~?
Aren't you going to invite any other girl? I'll win anyway, but don't you think that in this setting even winning will be awkward?
No other girls? ...I'm going to win anyway, but unless the guys all timely withdraw, seeing it all through will be awkward...
Ah, another girl will play after all! I was a bit worried for a moment...

Okay, then. I'm ready whenever you are.
Oh, so many people with a sense of fashion. Good taste, ~player~.
So many gamers! This will be a serious match, then.

I'd rather have a serious game, ~player~...

~Target.subj~ seems to come from a technologically advanced country too.
(That woman has a quite menacing aura about her... Does ~player~ know what ~player.subj~'s doing?)
(For some reason, that woman makes me think about Iris Heart...)
Those ears look so cute! Are they just an accessory or maybe...?
~Target.poss~ fierce red eyes... They foretell a thrilling fight.
Is this what your bedroom looks like now, ~player~? That poster... You really like idols, don't you?
This isn't what I'd expect your bedroom to look like, ~player~. Are you sure it isn't your sister's or a friend's of yours?
What is this place, ~player~? Don't tell me that the game is going to be recorded!
Well, we can play in this empty part of an office, but why don't we shut the curtains first?
Okay, we have a full table. Shall we start?
Quite a lot of players, but it's fine. I just have to be the last girl standing. Shall we start now?
Everyone is here, so now we're ready to play, right?

A full table is fine. It just means that more people will see me win.
It doesn't matter how many players there are. I'm going to win anyway.
We have enough players now. Shall we deal the cards for the first round?
The fourth player has just arrived. Do we start now, or are we waiting for one more person?
Another player has arrived... Who else is invited?
Sure, we can have a game with four or even five players if you think this'll make my visit in this dimension more worthwhile.
The more players, the more rounds it'll take me to win, but I have time to~background.time~. You don't have to worry about this, ~player~. I've already finished my work.

A male opponent? It's not a problem.

Was he too shy to play with all girls? Hehe~

Maybe she was too shy to play with boys. I myself don't care too much because I'm not going to lose.

So, you two are really going to start like that...?!
~Player~, this was supposed to be strip poker, not naked poker. You're making the game meaningless. Are you really not going to start again and wear pants at least?

~Player~, this was supposed to be strip poker, not naked poker. You're making the game meaningless. Are you really not going to restart and wear at least a skirt?
~Player~, I don't want people to associate me with you if you're acting like that. Why don't you restart the game and wear at least a skirt?

Only ~opponent~ and us? You're just cheesing the achievements, ~player~, aren't you? They should all require a full table of six-or-more-layer characters, really. But if you're so bad at poker... well, I'll give you a chance.
Only one other player, and you had to choose ~opponent~, who has so few layers? A true gamer would try to get good rather than cheese the achievements like that.

Just ~opponent~ and us? Not a very brave choice. If I wanted, I could easily choose not to give you any collectibles this time, you know? I'm just letting you have a chance to get them even if you're terrible at cards, so be grateful for that.

Why is everyone so lightly dressed? ...~Player~, you're cheesing the achievements, aren't you? They're not that hard. I'd enjoy it more if you were more brave and chose simply the opponents you like, not whoever has the least clothes.
The achievements aren't that difficult. ~Player~, I believe in you. Just play the game normally, and you'll unlock them eventually. No need to choose the most scantily-clad opponents possible.

~Player~, I'll give you a chance to get the collectibles even if we play at this table, but I'd really like you to try to improve as a gamer and become able to win even against a full table of seven- or eight-layer players.
A topless, underwear-only start? If that's really what you want, then so be it.
~Player~, are you really starting the game topless? That's extremely bold, but it also makes the game lose most of its meaning...
~Player~, we're not at a pool, so your state of undress is somewhat inappropriate. Even if it's strip poker, you could at least start dressed more completely.

So you're really going to start the game so scantily clothed, ~player~? If you aren't a card genius and don't put up a good fight, I won't even look at your body, so don't hold your hopes high for that.

Are you really wearing only this much, ~player~? If your plan is to lose without a fight and make me look at your body, then I'm not interested. Eh... Since I'm already here... Maybe the other players will offer more of a challenge.

Are you really wearing only this much, ~player~? If your plan is to lose without a fight and make me look at your body, then I'm not interested. Eh... Maybe that other ~opponent.ifMale(guy|girl)~ will offer more of a challenge at least.
Didn't I tell you to wear more clothes before we start? It hurts my pride as a gamer goddess for you to give me a handicap.
You're acting silly wearing less than me for the game, ~player~. A handicap is something that the better player might give to the less skilled one. It doesn't make sense the other way round.
Who do you think you are to give me a handicap, ~player~? I don't want it. I doubt you're anywhere near my level at any game.
Are you giving me a handicap, ~player~? It's kind of disrespectful---like offering rook odds to a 9-dan shogi player... Poker isn't my specialty, but I'm sure I'm better than you at all games.
Thank you, Miku! And I like your sleeves and thigh-highs... No bias here either!
Hello, Wikipe-tan! You'll certainly hear more, and maybe you'll become a believer of mine, too.

Don't play this indecent game, other Noire.

I didn't expect there'd be aliens playing, too...

Hello everyone, I'm Noire, also known as Black Heart, Goddess of Lastation. You're going to bear witness to my divine game skills.
Nice to meet you, ~opponent~. I'm Noire, goddess of Lastation. {ismall}(Just the three of us? Maybe ~player~ doesn't have many friends either...){!reset}
Nice to meet you all. I'm Noire, goddess of Lastation. (That's not even a full table. Maybe ~player~ doesn't have that many friends either...)
Good day to everyone. My name is Noire, but citizens of Lastation call me Lady Black Heart.
Good evening to everyone. My name is Noire, but citizens of Lastation call me Lady Black Heart.

Hi everyone, you can call me Noire. {ismall}(Are these all ~player~'s friends? It doesn't seem so. How did ~player.subj~ get them to play, then? I can't imagine myself walking around the bar and asking strangers to play strip poker.){!reset}

Hi everyone, I'm Noire... If you've all agreed to the rules, then let's start the game already. {small}Do you have so many friends, ~player~, or did ~player.subj~ just ask a few strangers to play with us?

state.script: (function () {var nowa = players[~self.slot~]; var armbandCG = new Clothing('armband', 'armband', 'extra', 'other', false); nowa.markers["CGStripRoute"] = 1; nowa.clothing[0] = armbandCG;})();

(function () {var nowa = players[~self.slot~]; var topCD = nowa.clothing[0]; var pantiesCD = nowa.clothing[1]; var bootsCD = nowa.clothing[2]; var CDRoute = getRandomNumber(1,3); nowa.markers["CDStripRoute"] = CDRoute; nowa.clothing[2] = pantiesCD; if (CDRoute == 1) {nowa.clothing[1] = bootsCD;} else {nowa.clothing[1] = topCD; nowa.clothing[0] = bootsCD;}})();

(function () {const twintailList = ["alpha", "amy", "ann", "aoba", "barbara", "cammy", "cammy_white", "elesa", "emi", "gaige", "harley", "hatsune_miku", "hilda", "hu_tao", "juri", "laevatein", "lucy", "marinette", "meg", "mitama", "myriam", "nagamimi", "nanoko-chan", "noire", "nugi-chan", "orendi", "rainbow_mika", "ringo", "rosa", "saki", "sanako", "sannytess", "sweetheart", "videl", "yuelia"]; const twoSideUpList = ["critical_darling", "fischl", "kyu", "natsuki", "pa-15", "queenie", "tharja", "uni"]; var nowa = players[~self.slot~]; nowa.markers["twintailCount"] = 0; nowa.markers["twoSideUpCount"] = 0; players.forEach(function (p) {if (twintailList.some((x) => x === p.id)) {if (p.hasTag("twintails")) {nowa.markers["__"+p.id+"_twintail"] = 1; nowa.markers["twintailCount"]++;}} else if (twoSideUpList.some((x) => x === p.id)) {nowa.markers["__"+p.id+"_twoSideUp"] = 1; nowa.markers["twoSideUpCount"]++;}});})()

A goddess's role is to protect and oversee her country, so in addition to fighting monsters and rebel robots, I do a lot of paperwork. To win people's faith, I accept various quests too. Maybe what I'm doing now can also be called a quest, albeit a silly one.

With breasts like that, it's no wonder you love them... I love mine too, but perhaps I love my hair even more. It's very soft and fun to play with, and I wouldn't exchange my twintails for anything. A saying goes that a girl's hair is her life, and there is some truth to it.
I do feel confident about my body as a whole. As a goddess, I have to be ready to have everyone's eyes centered on me anytime. But it doesn't mean I ever let people see me in my underwear or less...

Some companies make figures of us goddesses that can perhaps be called lewd artifacts. As long as it helps people's faith, I let it be, even though I have ambiguous feelings about them... Not even to mention the dakimakuras...

Sure, Cynthia, I could help you with your archaeological explorations! The power of Laplace Eye allows me to see the location of hidden treasures, so you'll see that my company is very useful!

state.text: I'm not familiar with this expression, but with it coming from you, I guess it's better not to ask for clarification... nor to even attempt to answer the question.
Do I really have to answer? ...I-I imagine I'd like a position where I could kiss and hug my partner, and feel ~player.poss~ warmth... There you have it.

case.state: I'd like a position where I could kiss and hug my partner, and feel ~player.poss~ warmth...
I'm fed up with having to act perfect and take responsibility for everything all the time. Maybe I could just let the other person choose the position and tell me what ~player.subj~ wants me to do.

As a goddess, I shouldn't say it, but I'm tired of always acting perfect and strong. I sometimes dream of just submitting to my partner and letting ~player.obj~ do with me whatever ~player.subj~ wants... Ehehe~

state.text: I don't know, but if it's very tiring or distracting, then I shouldn't overdo it. I can't neglect my work and duties as a goddess.

case.state: Of course, I never do such things! What's up with these personal questions?
Never, really... I only sometimes look at pictures and videos of slightly erotic cosplay. It's so sexy and cute... Ehehe~
Hardly ever... Erotic cosplay doesn't count as porn, right? It's so cute... Ehehe~
Hm! I'm not in a relationship, so I don't have to answer! How about the others?
Hm! I'm not in a relationship, so I don't have to answer! I don't want to hear your response either, ~player~!
I heard that everyone does it. Therefore, it'd be strange if I didn't, so maybe I do it sometimes too... B-But only extreeemely rarely...!

I'd like to wear something cute and see my partner have fun as I allow ~player.obj~ to strip me. So, I'd prefer the lights to be on, at least in the beginning... But it's not like it means I'm particularly enjoying this game! Don't mistake it for the same thing!

I imagine at the beginning I'd wear a sexy costume, and I'd let my partner take off my panties and whatever else ~player.subj~'d like. So the lights should better be on... But it's not like there is any similarity between that and this game! Don't misunderstand me! It's a totally different thing!

I imagine I'd wear lingerie or a sexy costume, so I'd prefer the lights on so that the other person can appreciate it, at least while I'm still wearing something... But the feeling of intimacy when the lights are off might also be nice...
I don't know, but if you want the lights off, can't you just close your eyes?
I wouldn't blame anyone for past mistakes, but only provided they've learned from them.
If someone learned from those mistakes and became a better person, I wouldn't blame them. But if they learned nothing, then the story is different!

If you're asking a question like that, I assume it's a lot of money. I don't know about prices in this world, but in Gamindustri, clothes and accessories are incredibly expensive. That's one more reason to make them yourself instead of buying... N-Not that I do it myself!
My younger sister Uni is very important to me, and precisely for that reason I demand a lot from her. I want her to become a powerful goddess, so she still has a lot to learn.
They're irresponsible. If you aren't immortal, you should avoid things that shorten you life.
It's impossible to be always frank and to say what you really think, so some little lies are necessary, aren't they?
I wouldn't call them dark, but I do have some small secrets that I want to hide... As everyone does, probably. But if I don't tell them to anyone, it means I won't tell you either!
I'd like to know that myself, Meia. Maybe we'll find some time for sightseeing after the game.

I can't say for her if she'd be interested, but my acquaintance Cave is so agile that she can walk through the rain without getting wet. If avoiding missiles and asteroids in a Dread takes the same skills, then I doubt you'll find anyone with more potential than her.
What!? No one in Lastation will know what I'm doing to~background.time~! And get those dirty thoughts out of your head! I'm here to win and leave, not to get horny or anything!

Nowa!? I'm not going to let anyone know what I did to~background.time~! And don't imagine me doing or thinking any of the things you said! I'll leave as soon as ~player~ withdraws, with my dignity intact!

In that case, Cynthia, you'd love to meet Histoire, the oracle of Planeptune. She knows all the history of Gamindustri. It might take her three days to recall certain small details from the far past, but I'm sure you two would get along well.

You really should meet Histoire, then, Cynthia. She's the oracle of Planeptune, and she's archived all the history of Gamindustri. Nowadays, she's mostly busy with paperwork and trying to make Neptune do quests instead of lazing around and gobbling up pudding.
Even if I say so myself... The most impactful event was me becoming a goddess and founding Lastation! Gamindustri has at least one respectable country now.

Once, I was betrayed by the founder of the biggest company in Lastation, and Blanc was betrayed by one of her ministers. I don't want it to happen to anyone, Heris, but after something like that, you really start to appreciate how important loyalty is.
Heris, nothing will help you as much as having a regular lifestyle. I work a lot too, but I'm able to wake up at five o'clock and feel well rested.
A friend should help and advise me when I need it, play games with me, make me feel less lonely... I was just joking with that last one! I don't feel lonely at all!
A friend should help and advice me when I need it, play games with me... and sometimes hug me and make me feel less lonely...

state.text: I can fly in my goddess form. There is no more efficient form of transport than that.

case.state: I love to walk around Lastation from time to time. It's nice to see that the country thrives.
(Have I accidentally told Heris about cosplay?! I hope not...)
I come from far away too, ~jim~! I warped here through an interdimensional portal. Although in my case, it was instantaneous and didn't feel like a long journey at all.
I usually play video games, not card games. If I help improve the game I playtest and win some shares for Lastation, that's reward enough for me.
I'm a goddess, ~jim~, and I don't know anything about those Xel-- ...whoever you just mentioned. But I'm in my human form, and won't use any special powers, so let's just have a fun game.

condition.saying: Koprulu ain't one of the places you watch over or somethin'

case.state: Hehe, my power doesn't extend that far... at least not yet.
Actually, I use both a sword and magic, but I'm not your typical fantasy battlemage.
Uhm... Does my outfit look out of place here, after all?

I came here through a transdimensional portal, Colress. I'll leave the distinction between dimensions, worlds and universes to you scientists, but if all the places I've visited lie within the same universe, then I don't feel a need to travel to other ones.
I was invited by ~player~. Don't dare imagine too strong `connections`, though, Colress.
I don't play card games often, but this basic version of poker is so simple compared to most video games that my experience is completely sufficient.
I'm a goddess, but I think you already know that, Colress. I'm wondering if my country could use some help from a scientist from another world, or is Lastation's technology too far ahead...
Don't ask me, Jura. Once, together with Blanc we read a book about becoming popular, but the advice seemed misguided. You have to discover your way by yourself.
You have to find your own way, Jura. I've read a book about becoming popular, but the advice was all strange. It's not something you can learn from a manual.
It's still too early for me, Jura. Ever since I became a goddess, I haven't had enough time for myself. I don't want even more responsibilities.

If they were unable to do something, it's their fault for not asking me to help. I'm always very busy, but if they're a friend, then maybe I'd stop all the work and do everything in my might to help them. Maybe.
I like chocolate cakes, cookies... Anything with dark chocolate and not too much sugar. Sweetness must be balanced by a little bitterness or spiciness, otherwise the taste is just flat.
I'd rather not beat them up, but if I had no other choice... So better remember that and don't do anything silly, ~player~!
Ehehe~ Thank you, Adrien. It took you quite a lot of time to finally notice...
Thank you, Adrien. Obviously, I'm not to be compared with mere mortals.
Some people just don't deserve to witness a goddess's descend among mortals and are lost for words when they want to compliment her unblemished skin and immaculate beauty. Understandable.
I read a guide to making friends, but I don't recommend it. Tips from such books never seem to work.
I-I'm not really interested in things like that!

state.text: I-I imagine I'd like a position where I could kiss and hug my partner and feel ~player.poss~ warmth...

I shouldn't be saying it, but I'm fed up with acting perfect and taking responsibility for everything all the time. Sometimes, I dream of just submitting to my partner and letting ~player.obj~ do with me whatever ~player.subj~ wants...
Huh? I've seen a lot of weird magic, but that is something new. Do you just create those limbs, or do you share the sense of touch with them too?
Hm... Now that's a strange skill. Is it merely summoning, or can you feel those replicated body parts as if they really were yours?

case.state: I sometimes sleep naked... only sometimes! Some say it improves sleep quality, so it's perfectly normal to try it out... but I feel much more at ease in my nightwear.
I don't have any weird quirks. And I'm sure that you're exaggerating yours for the show.
My goddess powers are super cool. But I'd love to also have the power of... {small}making friends...{!reset} even more easily than now!

You're right about the outlets, Joey! People think I'm a workaholic, and they wouldn't suspect that every day I can't wait to finish my work and unwind doing some cos-- I mean, to indulge in some little hobbies of mine.
Doink? Is that how clowns call it? ...Uhm... I don't want to have anything to do with perverts! That's the first rule!

condition.saying: Hm. This isn't a setup, is it? ...I wonder if it's better to just ask someone to get naked, or if a game makes it a bit easier?

case.state: W-What!? ...I heard that, Leon! I'm not here to get naked regardless of yours or ~player~'s supplications! And I won't make it any easier through the game either, so forget about it at any rate!
Ammo? If you're a master of swordsmanship and magic, you never have to worry about things like that.
With a sword, you never have to worry about things like that, ~leon~.

condition.saying: Anyone a wrestler? I've got a pretty mean suplex and powerbomb. Even taught the president's daughter.

case.state: Teaching a girl to wrestle? There are so many fighting styles that would be more suitable for her! I'm just hoping you didn't try to do anything strange during the lessons, Leon.

It's mundane, and the colors are less vibrant than what I'm used to, but the scale is impressive. Mountains are taller, seas wider, and cities bigger. A goddess here could have millions---or billions!---of believers.
I'll tell her about it, but she's also needed in my world. She could grind a few levels with you and get some new skills, but I don't want her to leave for too long. She might not want it either.
Thank you, Noelle, and good luck! ...But I'm not in one team with ~player~ or anything like that!
I'm glad to play with you too, Noelle. Good luck! ...By the way, ~player~ and I have joined the game separately! We aren't a set.
It's not a pain to say at all, Kumatora! It's a very nice name. I can pronounce Neptune's name easily, so yours isn't a problem either!
Do people really find "Kumatora" hard to pronounce? I said it so many times to~background.time~ and didn't even notice! But I can pronounce Neptune's name easily too, so maybe it's just me?
Precisely! That's why it's my plan to make a hundred friends this year! But "especially close"? Shouldn't you be equally close to all of your friends no matter how many you have? ...Ahaha~...

Not many people have seen me in a state of undress, not many of my friends, even, so, hypothetically, if someone at this poker table happened to be a friend of mine, ~player.subj~ could be considered an especially close one...

state.text: You're on the right track, ~kumatora~, but I'd say no clothing destruction in general... Can you imagine how many believers want fanservice from their goddess? I don't fight monsters and robots for that purpose.
{vsmall}Making friends...{!reset} Ahaha, you're totally correct, ~kumatora~... PSI, telekinesis and stuff all sound very cool, but hotsprings are more than nice...

case.state: A goddess doesn't catch or spread anything like that... But I wash my hands often anyway. I like when everything is clean.

...The sewing machine, maybe? Not that I'd use it myself... But I couldn't do without clothes---just like everyone---and they'd be hard to make without it.

state.text: Right... I like it when my sister Uni helps me brush and tie up my hair. I usually do it myself, but it feel much more special when she does it. I do the same for her, too.

Neptune's and my games aren't always masterpieces of coding, but they don't have this many glitches.

I'm not very fond of hackers, but so far I still prefer you to Anonydeath, ~monika~. At least you aren't using hacking for lewd purposes... The cards I'm dealt are still within my normal luck.

It's not easy to find anyone competent and reliable, Aqua. I have my oracle Kei, but I can't make her work overtime... With her salary, it'd be very expensive! If you want something done properly, you have to do it yourself.
PlayStation? That sounds like a name of a village in Lastation, next to Lastantion and Lanstation. Ahaha~! Someone in this world had a good naming sense too!

state.text: I'll go with PlayStation! I mean, you can tell just by how it sounds that it must be the right choice. It's better if we avoid a war, though.

case.state: If your club lacks members, then first you should focus on persuasion and being persistent. I helped Neptune and Blanc a lot with their film club, but it's not like I really wanted to join. I just had to do it so that Neptune would stop nagging me about it.
Now it's only the two of us, ~player~! I'll be happy no matter which of us wins, but don't think I'll make it easy for you.
Now it's only the two of us, ~player~! I know I'm in the lead, but don't try to lose on purpose! I want it to be a satisfying final showdown!
Now it's only the two of us, ~player~! If you show me that you're able to defeat me, I'll show you... anything you want.
I knew I'd be among the winners, but I didn't expect you to fare that well, ~player~! I'm impressed! Let's now have a final showdown between us two!

state.text: ~Player~ once worked as my manager when I wanted to become an idol. ~Player.poss~ help wasn't such a big deal; I could have done everything by myself just as well. Nevertheless, I am slightly thankful, so I let ~player.obj~ invite me to this place to~background.time~.

~Player~ and I know each other. ~Player.subj~ once worked as my secretary. To~background.time~ ~player.subj~ invited me to ~player.poss~ world for this silly game, so it's time to show ~player.obj~ once again who's the boss.

case.state: Each country in Gamindustri is ruled by a goddess. Planeptune has the good-for-nothing pudding-eater Neptune, and her sister, goddess candidate Nepgear, is only slightly more diligent.
Are Planeptune's citizens alright with a goddess like that?

A goddess's role is to protect and oversee her country, so in addition to fighting monsters and rebel robots, I do a lot of paperwork. To win popularity and people's faith, I accept various quests too. Maybe what I'm doing now can also be called a quest, albeit a silly one.

My main duty as a goddess is to rule my country and battle those who endanger it, but I also accept various requests from my believers, be it giving them advice or playtesting games. To~background.time~, I'm here for a similar reason... although this isn't the kind of game I'd normally playtest.

I'm a goddess, but I'm not omnipotent, so you don't have to worry I'll influence what cards are dealt. I influence the prosperity of the country I rule, though. My role is to fight monsters and do paperwork, and I'm godly skilled at both.

As a goddess, I do all I can for my worshipers. When I run out of paperwork, I fight monsters, and when I run out of monsters, I do miscellaneous quests. Let's say that I'm here on a quest too, albeit an exceptionally silly one.

Did I mention Vert? She's the goddess and ruler of Leanbox. The motto of her country is "the bigger, the better", and she herself is a good advertisement of it... whenever she appears in public instead of shutting herself in her room playing MMORPGs.

Have I mentioned Blanc? She's a goddess of destruction and flatness, as Vert once said... The first part of her description is true only when anyone makes an allusion to the second... or criticizes Blanc's writing.

state.text: ~Player~ and I know each other. ~Player.subj~ once worked as my secretary. To~background.time~ ~player.subj~ invited me to ~player.poss~ world for this silly game, so it's time to show ~player.obj~ once again who's the boss.

~Player~ once worked as my manager when I wanted to become an idol. ~Player.poss~ help wasn't such a big deal; I could have done everything by myself just as well. Nevertheless, I am slightly thankful, so I let ~player.obj~ invite me to this place to~background.time~.

I visited ~player~ a few times when Gamindustri was threatened by the Dark Goddesses, and ~player.subj~ gave me some advice. My participation in this silly game is already more than returning the favor, though, as I risk having to see ~player.poss~ nudity. But ~player.subj~'ll likely withdraw from the game before that.

I should make it clear so that nobody gets a wrong idea: This is a normal outfit where I come from, not any kind of cosplay. Understood?

Are you a practitioner of the way of the sword now, ~player~? It's great that you want to emulate me and become stronger.

You didn't need to bring a sword here. Even if I don't have as much power as in Lastation, I can still easily protect you from any danger here. Or maybe you brought it because you wanted to show off to me?
If you want a sparring partner, you should ask my little sister to practice together. Swords aren't her specialty, but I've taught her the basics... I'd quite like to see it!
Do you actually train fencing now, ~player~, or is the sword just a part of a costume?
Baring your chest yet still keeping your sword... That's cool... or should I say hot?
Your sword is not just for show. It seems that you really became stronger, ~player~!
If you're trying to hold your sword so as to cover your nudity, then you better be careful... It looks hot, though...

(In Lastation, people bow before me and lower their eyes to show respect, but now all these men are lowering their eyes to ogle my body... It's so humiliating... but why does my body react as if I enjoyed it?)
It's not like I have no other friends and couldn't wait until you finally invited me to your world for a game, ~player~! It certainly took you a lot of time, though.
I don't want you to think I have no other friends and couldn't wait till you finally invited me to your world to spend some time together, ~player~. That's totally not how it was.

~Player~, don't read too much into my accepting your invitation. It just happened that to~background.time~ I finished my work much earlier than expected, and didn't have any plans what to do next. My other friends were still busy, you know?
How could I end up in this situation... It's all your fault, ~player~.
If we've seen each other in our underwear, it means we're already friends, right?
The books here are a bit weird. I saw a few magic grimoires but also books about... indecent things! Do you... um... peruse stuff like that? Maybe you should hide them somewhere!
Do you want me to help you clean this place after the game, ~player~? It's somewhat creepy! I saw a cobweb, and the book selection is... weird. Maybe some of them should be hidden from view.

Before we start for real, you should at least thank me in advance for all the skin I may have to reveal, ~player~.

I've heard that studying naked is more efficient. It's something you'd rather do at home, though...

~Player~, are you interested in cosplay? ...If not, then I'm not that interested either, but if you are, then maybe {small}you have some {!reset}{vsmall}requests for me to consider...{!reset}

Maybe we should have all worn swimsuits under our clothes.

I'm closer to winning than to getting naked! But I'll allow ~player~ to see a bit more if it helps ~player.obj~... f-finish quicker and not be watched any longer by other people!
You finally won a round, ~player~. Good. Try to play properly from now on, because I won't always be so helpful.
So you at least won this round, ~player~. Good. Try to pose more of a challenge from now on, because I'm not going to be so helpful all the time.

With pleasure! I'll tell you about Lastation's goddess candidate Black Sister, or, in other words, my sister Uni! She's a bit shorter than me, puts her hair up in the two-side-up style or in drill twintails and specializes in guns!

Okay... There is Purple Heart, or Neptune. She spends all days lazing around and eating snacks. A useless goddess... Her country would have collapsed long ago were it not for her oracle and her sister!

Not at all! The country of Lowee is ruled by White Heart, or Blanc. Usually, she's busy writing novels and fanfics, but she knows ice magic, and uses a hammer---almost bigger than herself---to flatten those who made her snap!

Not at all! Let's talk about Green Heart, or Vert. On the surface, she's a refined, tea-drinking princess who embodies her country's "bigger is better" philosophy, starting with two of her three sizes---but she's also a game junkie and a hikikomori.
Don't force yourself to carry on with that "loner" joke. I too have a friend... or two, you know.

Nowa!? Of course not! If you can see something you shouldn't, isn't it just because you are too short? {vsmall}I could try using a slightly heavier textile so that the skirts don't fold up so easily.{!reset}
Are you sure this is the best moment to talk about that?
That would otherwise sound fun, but with it coming from you, I have nothing but bad premonitions... You don't have any experience making clothes, do you?
Y-Yeah... Of course, I wouldn't normally lose so easily to a beginner! I decided to give you a bit more handicap, is all.
M-Maybe I did, maybe I didn't, but you still got the better cards by yourself, so you only have yourself to thank.
N-No... I got a bad hand totally by accident, so don't thank me.
If anything, it's ~player~ who should have thrown, not me, but I knew ~player.subj~ wouldn't.
It took you all your clothes just to beat me once, ~mari_setogaya~! ...Well, since you're asking so nicely, maybe I'll finally let you see whether I'm wearing a bra.
I've only lost once since then. You've lost the whole game in the meantime, ~mari_setogaya~. But since we had so much fun watching your performance, indeed maybe I'll do as you say...
Um... It's good that you're so competitive now, ~mari_setogaya~, but I didn't mean to take off my top after just one loss!
What? Just one win since then, and you're ordering a goddess to take off her top?! It's good that you're competitive now, but aren't you too full of yourself, ~mari_setogaya~?
I've only lost once since then. You've lost the whole game in the meantime, ~mari_setogaya~. But since we're having so much fun watching your performance, indeed maybe I'll do as you say...
There goes my bra... ~Player~, what's that look? Do you want me to take off my panties? Forget about it!
Uh... So much for my bra...... Did you just say something, ~player~? No, I won't take off my panties instead! No way!

Natsuki, maybe I focused everyone's stare on you a bit too much by teasing you about your fruity underwear... But there isn't much I can do to distract ~player~ from your present state... {small}Or maybe if I...{!reset}
In different worlds, time often flows at different rates, so I don't really know if I can say I come from the future, but... maybe I do? I'm certainly proud of Lastation's technological prowess.

If your world doesn't have sentient robots, then you could say I come from the future. I don't know if every other world will attain that level of technology even after decades or centuries of progress, though.

It can't be helped. A goddess must be charismatic and idol-like to gain shares, so it's inevitable she wants to draw the eye a little. With this short skirt, I'll have to be extra careful while taking off my socks, though.

Well, thank you. A goddess's power depends on her popularity, so to draw the beholders' eye is a good thing. This doesn't mean I'll let anyone try to look up my skirt while I'm taking off my socks, though.
Non-traditional? What do you mean?
Do you think so, Tao? Isn't it normal for a girl to try to make someone notice...?
Nice of you to say it even as I'm going to take off my bra, but I'm not an old-fashioned goddess who cares about prayers and genuflections... If that's what you meant...
Sure, Tao, I don't keep aloof from my believers, especially if they're my friends too.

It can't be helped. A goddess must be charismatic and idol-like to gain shares, so it's inevitable she wants to draw the eye a little. Even more if she wants to become popular as an idol too, so I wore a slightly shorter skirt to~background.time~.
Well, thank you. A goddess's power depends on her popularity, so to draw the beholders' eye is a good thing. But it's true I don't always wear skirts that are this short.

I don't know about any other kinds of goddesses, but I wake up early in the morning every day, exercise a bit, sign some documents, and fight monsters when I run out of paperwork. I need people to have faith in me!
These clothes are meant to evoke the image of a goddess, overseeing and protecting a country. Because that's what I do!
I'm a goddess, ruling over the country of Lastation, but these are my idol clothes! ...This didn't sound very convincing to you---or did it?

That entails a lot. I wake up early in the morning and try to strengthen people's faith in me. Some people want me to be active in daily politics, some want me to hunt monsters, and some to perform as an idol!

Um...?! N-No one before called me adorable as the first thing they said... But I don't dislike it! Ehehe~
I thought a lot about this outfit, which I wanted to be cute and appropriate for a goddess... You can continue!

N-Natural cuteness...!
Of course, as a goddess, I know my worth, and you can't sway me with a compliment... But I'll gladly hear more feedback on these clothes that I thought of! Is there any detail you like in particular?
Adrien, are you implying there is any possibility of me taking off my panties? No way! ...You too, ~player~, don't stare at me!
It's not a cosplay, Natsuki! I never do cosplay unless I'm forced by Neptune or someone else! These are my everyday clothes!
Nowa!? It's not a cosplay! This is perfectly standard fashion where I come from!
It's not a cosplay, Natsuki! I never do cosplay unless I'm forced by Neptune or someone else! These are just the clothes I once wore as an idol and sometimes wear during quests!
Nowa!? It's not a cosplay! This is perfectly standard idol fashion where I come from!
I lost again... I'm going to take off my bra... No, ~player~, I won't move on straight to the forfeit. Even now, I still have a chance to win.
I lost again... I'm going to take off the rest of my clothes... No, ~player~, I won't move on straight to the forfeit. That'd be a bit too much.
What are you talking about, ~mari_setogaya~? It's a regular idol outfit, designed simply to feel comfortable on scene... And maybe I am wearing a bra? You can never know.
You formulated it in a very disrespectful way, ~streamingchan~. I don't need to tell you anything.
What are you talking about, ~streamingchan~? You're being a bit too disrespectful.
You're correct on both accounts, Aqua! I'm a goddess, and this is my outfit I wore on stage as an idol. It's a great way to gain popularity and shares!
You're right, Aqua, but a goddess can perform as an idol too, sometimes!
That must have been embarrassing. I wouldn't want anyone around when I'm dressing up.
That sounds like it was a very inconvenient design, ~meia~. It must have been awkward to be unable to wear it by yourself.
Action is what matters the most, but it's easier to act in a way that is congruous with your outfit! That's why there are various kinds of uniforms, for example.
Perhaps, but if you start with your clothes, it's easier to get in the mood for what you want to accomplish.

If I ever spend time on clothes, it's after work! And only exceedingly rarely!
...You should know that I'm in fact the most diligent among the goddesses.
I-I don't spend much time on that at all...! It's the other goddesses' work ethic that you should question, not mine.
What tarmac? I'm an idol, not a race girl. But if you want me to wave a chequered flag when you finish stripping all your clothes, I can do it for you.

At least compare me to a race girl, not a car.
But if you must---I'll keep a leisurely pace and let you be the first to finish.
Of course this is what I normally wear... I have no interest whatsoever in things like sewing and cosplaying! ...But thank you for your compliment, Nagisa.
That's all correct, Hilda! ...But I dye my hair pink sometimes! It's a shame I didn't do it today. Would you then be my older or my younger sister?
You're quite right, Hilda... But can you imagine that I sometimes dye my hair pink? It's one of my favorite colors too! So... do you think you'd be the older or the younger sister?
Don't get ahead of yourself, Neptune. As long as my LUK isn't debuffed to zero, I can still defeat you.
Well, you're right, ~marinette~. I'm in my human form, but I'm a goddess. How did you know?

Sorry to disappoint you, ~marinette~, but I will not. Goddess's power aren't something to be used just to show off. Besides, doing it in this dimension would cost me much more share energy than usual.
Sorry to disappoint you, ~marinette~, but I will not. Goddess's power aren't something to be used just to show off.
N-No, I'm not here to find anyone... There is no rule that a goddess cannot date, but it's simply impossible because I have... so much work. Right.
In a sense, yes. My special skills get recharged as I take or deal hits during battle.
Well, that's your fault for losing so many rounds. But let's hear it.

Thanks, Lysithea, but I like my short skirts and won't dress different than usual just for a silly game. And don't make it sound as if I intended to show more later, and it were merely a question of when.

Thank you, Lysithea, but I wouldn't feel comfortable having to wear something less cute just to cover more skin---unless I had to visit a really cold country in winter, that is. I won't show much more than this, though!
Thanks, Lysithea... But choosing your clothes isn't about predicting your exposure rate measured in square inches of skin revealed per second. Just wear what you think looks cute!
That's for sure! Fufun~ You're pretty observant to have understood it already.
Ooh? Finally someone who understands! Hehe~ Be my guest! I can't really explain my card swaps before everyone else finishes theirs, but you can watch carefully how I play and try to emulate it!
What? I don't need any validation! I have a lot of shares, a... um... a lot of friends, and so on! If you haven't heard of me, it's just because I'm not necessarily a goddess in your dimension.
It's not just a claim! I'm simply not necessarily a goddess in your dimension, but who knows what places I'll visit in the future.
D-Definitely not! I'm just doing it on a special request from ~player~, to express my gratitude. I don't know what my other believers would think about it if they knew...

D-Definitely not! I can't speak for ~other~, but I'm only doing it on a special request from ~player~, to express my gratitude! I don't know what my other believers would think about it if they knew...

I'm the type of deity that is real and not just a role in a movie! It's true that goddesses strive for popularity and people's faith, but we don't do it by taking off our clothes. That's worse script writing than Blanc's! How can you play in something that shameful?

Yeah, I'm the type of goddess that has real divine powers and isn't just a role. I played in two zombie movies when I was a student, by the way, so don't think I'm a novice. Maybe my acting is already better than yours! How am I not qualified to play a goddess in a film?
What!? Do I look to you like someone who came here to strip? I'm going to defeat you fair and square, Ringo, and I won't even give you time to finish your meal!

Not even once yet... N-No, what I meant to say is---what a silly question! I'm a goddess, and ~player~ was just my secretary, so, obviously, what you're asking about is impossible! I'm sure thoughts like that have never even crossed ~player~'s mind either!
Nowa?! What gave you the idea to ask a question like that?! ...How exactly do you imagine the job of an idol manager, ~mari_setogaya~?
Done what? ...Wait, don't answer... I'm... not interested in stuff like that! I'm a goddess and all!

She's Neptune's oracle, but I'll explain it better. Histoire is an artificial being, who looks like a small girl. She records the whole history of Gamindustri and can do almost everything if you give her three days to think it over. She created the portals through which Neptune and I came here, too.
I hold high scores in several games, Revy, and many people who worship me are nerds, but I'm a goddess in general, so you should show me a bit more respect.
Games are important where I come from, but I'm not just a goddess at games. I'm a goddess in all respects, so you better not underestimate me, Revy.

~Player~ helped me a few times in my adventures. Once ~player.subj~ was my secretary, and together we won my shares back and stopped the rebellion among my generals. It's a long story, but I am slightly grateful to ~player~, and so I agreed to play to~background.time~.

~Player~ helped me a few times in the past. Once, when I wanted to become an idol, ~player.subj~ was my producer. My sister would've likely done an equally good job, but I am slightly grateful, and so I agreed to play to~background.time~.
If ~player.subj~ wants to play again that much, then it can't be helped. It's true this game is kind of... fun.
If ~player.subj~ wishes so much for a rematch, then it can't be helped. This game is slightly perverted, but I like how each piece of clothing gets a lot of attention.
So you've already played this game, ~player~, and you even got Mari to show you everything? Hmph! I-It's not like I care.

That doesn't surprise me. ~Player~ seems like someone to withdraw as soon as ~player.subj~ starts losing. But if ~player.subj~ gets very lucky with the cards, then ~player.subj~'ll likely stay here to stare at us. I bet that's ~player.poss~ way of playing.
So there was a last time too? You're veteran strip poker players, aren't you? I hope you two did preserve some modesty. I don't want to hear any details, though.

I'm not that excited. I can tell you exactly what it'll be like. ~Player~ will lose a few rounds, and then ~player.subj~'ll withdraw and want to end the game. ~Player.subj~'s been very lucky so far, though.
Excited? No, certainly not. Don't imagine I'd be excited by a game like this one... or by the prospect of seeing even more of ~player~.
Strange as it may seem, I'm here just for this game. Lastation hasn't conquered all of Gamindustri yet, by the way, but I agree with you that it should.
I'm visiting this place just for this one game. And to clarify, Gamindustri isn't unified under my rule yet. For now, I let the other three countries be.
Exactly. A real goddess doesn't need a weapon when visiting such a tame place. If you'd like to practice fencing, I wouldn't be against meeting some other time, though.
Even without a weapon, I'm still a real goddess, and a master of fire and light magic. However... if you really want to spar with rapiers, maybe in the future we could find time for that.

I do appreciate your fashion sense, Jura, but don't talk as if you were Vert. You look like her, with your proportions, hairstyle and the way you dress... but she's an actual goddess like me, while you're just a flashy person.

I like your style too, but you should learn some humility. My friend Vert has exactly your looks, and she's a true goddess to boot. Whereas I sense no---actually, I do sense a faint supernatural aura about you. What's that?
I'm not that excited. I can tell you exactly what it'll be like. ~Player~ will lose a few more rounds, and then ~player.subj~'ll withdraw and want to end the game.

Yeah, and I see you like the color black, too. But tell me more about the clothes. I'd like to... I mean, my friend who designed them would like to know more about Earth's fashion. Some feedback might help her in her future projects...

Right... it's a strange coincidence that the name you go by is so similar to mine. But tell me more what you like about my clothes... if you know anything about fashion design, that is. Men in my world don't seem to care about it.

Yes, that's what I do! How did you know? I'm a defender of justice as a goddess, not a magical girl, though... {ismall}(I could try dyeing my hair pink and fighting in an even frillier costume... That'd be so fun! But how would I keep it secret from Neptune and the others?){!reset}

You guessed it! I've saved my world a few times! This is an outfit of a goddess, though, not a magical girl... {ismall}(But fighting as a magical girl would be so much fun, too... I'd wear a cute pink costume and only use magic instead of my rapier... Ahaha!){!reset}

To transform into my Black Heart form, I need shares, which come from popularity and people's faith in me, but simpler magic just comes to me naturally. You could ask MAGES how it works, but you'd have to be a bit crazy to understand her explanation.
Hmm... depends on the kind of modeling you have in mind. Why are you asking, though?
If you didn't mean it in a strange way, then I'll give you a chance to explain. Why are you asking?
I wore it neither for ~player~ nor for you, though, so don't you read into it too much.

Games play a special role in my world, and naturally I'm a skilled gamer, but I'm called a goddess because I don't age and can use share energy to transform into a divine form. But my Luck stat is rather low, so it's not that I can't lose.

I'm a goddess in general, not only when it comes to games. I never age, and I can use share energy to wield godly powers in battle. I can't control luck, though, so you may have a chance if it's a game like this.

I usually play with the other goddesses, and we're all about equal in skill. But my games against my sister Uni are mostly one-sided. I never give her a handicap. It might be harsh, but she has to learn to be strong the hard way, even if it feels bitter to her.

There are no clear losers when I play with the other goddesses, but I usually win against my younger sister Uni. I want to teach her how to be strong, but now that you say it, I wonder if I'm not too strict toward her... Do you think I should let her win sometimes?

What makes you think so, ~nami~? It might be hard to imagine, but despite all the robots and computers, life in Lastation isn't that much different. I do enjoy baking, cleaning, singing and dancing, trying on cute clothes...
~Nami~, do I look too nerdy to you? I do enjoy simple things like cooking, cleaning, dancing, dressing up in cute clothes...

Nowa!? The word is Lastation, LASTATION! That's how I named the country I protect, because I thought it sounds cool. It does, right? When you don't mispronounce it? ...Um, I fight monsters and playtest games, I'm not a scholar... And I wield no power over milk.

What!? It's Lastation, LASTATION! That's the cool name I thought of and gave to the country I rule. Please don't mispronounce it! ...My power is battle-oriented, and I often playtest games too, but I'm not a linguist or a poet... And not a goddess of milk either!

Well, I am a goddess, or, in other words, a CPU! Trixie, if goddesses of your world are so hard-working, no wonder the cities they oversee wax in size and opulence. Can you tell me more about how you met them?

I call myself a goddess because I am one. We deities must indeed be diligent for our cities to prosper, even if most of my peers don't get it. So, where exactly did you meet those hard-working goddesses, Trixie?

It's when you dress up as a character from an anime or a game, or as a stereotypically cute character, like a magical girl, a schoolgirl, a maid... But it's not like I'm particularly interested in stuff like that or make any costumes myself...
It's a line from one of my songs! Miku, where did you hear it?
That song, "Jet-Black Sustain", is about my ceaseless vigilance in protecting my country and my believers as their goddess.
Hyee? ...N-No, it's the first time I've heard about her. Of course it's not me.
~Player~ has visited my world a few times. Once, ~player.subj~ worked as my secretary. I have to admit that ~player.poss~ presence was slightly helpful.

~Player~ has visited my world a few times. Once, ~player.subj~ worked as my idol manager. My sister could have done the same job just as well, but ~player~ did save her some work, and I'm grateful for that.

I met ~player~ several times when Gamindustri was threatened by the Dark Goddesses, and ~player.subj~ gave me some advice. ~Player.subj~'s also visited my world a few times, so yes, we are acquaintances.
Indeed! People's faith in me gives me power, and I in turn protect them from danger and respond to some of their requests.
Yes, that's correct! There are no complicated rituals, but people putting their faith in me give me strength to protect them and to help them in other ways.

A crush? Er, um, n-no, it's not like that... But once when ~player~ was going to visit my dimension, the portal appeared too high up and ~player.subj~ crashed into and almost crushed me... At least ~player.subj~ wasn't hurt...
(Do I really stare at ~player.obj~ too much?) ...Kyou, let's be serious. ~Player~ has helped me once or twice, but I'm not interested in love. I'm a goddess and all. You must have misunderstood it.

My most important duty is to fight monsters and robots to protect my citizens. In peaceful times, I do paperwork and respond to various requests. But it's not that I have no time at all for my hobbies.
Yes, Kyou, I'm an actual goddess, and I rule over a country called Lastation. If you ever visit the world of Gamindustri, you'll be able to see for yourself.
I was serious, Kyou. I'm an actual goddess, and I rule over Lastation, the most prosperous country in the world of Gamindustri. It might sound strange, but it's all true.

Really cool? Hehe~ I know, but thank you! I'm a goddess, so I fight monsters and do various quests... But I rarely visit this dimension, so I'm glad I found here someone who appreciates Lastation's fashion.
Is that another meaning of the word "goddess" in this world? I should keep it in mind when I talk about myself, then. But no, I never do things like that, Natsuki.
In this world, do goddesses model underwear? I wouldn't do it no matter how many shares I'd win.
Maybe. But I love this look too. Is there something wrong with it, Natsuki?
Even otaku are sometimes right. I love this style so much, I can't imagine myself with anything else. If I accidentally cater to some of my believers, it's like hitting two birds with one stone.
You can draw ~player~'s attention away from me anytime you want, Natsuki. I don't really care for it, or anything.
Indeed, Natsuki, it's embarrassing to be stared at by someone like ~player~! It's not like I'm doing anything to draw ~player.poss~ attention. Distract ~player.obj~ if you want.
Natsuki, don't lead ~player~ to such a misunderstanding... (I should be grateful to her if she helps ~player~ notice...)
Natsuki, what in the world are you talking about? (Is it really obvious to her? ~Player~ probably hasn't noticed even now.)
That's right, Ringo. You don't seem a novice to games either, and apparently you can use some magic too, so I'm hoping for an interesting battle.
I'm very famous in my world. I'm the goddess of one its nations. I've also performed as an idol. Could it be that some my performances have reached even the dimension where you live?

I'm not a scholar. I use magic, but I can't really explain how it works. I only know that I need shares to use my strongest powers. I hope you won't miss the magic of my thigh-highs, though, ~adrien~, because now I have to take them off.

Yes, Ringo, I'm from another dimension, from a world called Gamindustri. Histoire created a portal for me, using share energy, and she'll create another one when I want to return... But do you mean that you don't know how to go back home?

You seem to think about one thing only, ~mari_setogaya~! Just that I agreed to play strip poker with ~player.obj~ means nothing! ...But since you have so much experience, I'll let you tell me, hypothetically, what place you recommend!

If you tried, you'd like my type of games too. Imagine that you have a picture of yourself, but there is a way to make your semblance in it move and take any actions you want. Other people have similar moving pictures of themselves, and there is a way to make your semblances play hide-and-seek together. Wouldn't that be fun?

The games I play are different, yet often they attempt to mimic the ones you're familiar with... If you could use a small device to make a model of yourself run, jump or crouch in a painted, imaginary scenery and play hide-and-seek with people all over the world who control their models in the same way, don't you think it'd be fun?

I'm not trying all that hard, it really comes effortlessly... I-I mean, it would come to me effortlessly if I needed. Just like all other things! ......So, do you find stripping for someone and watching others strip interesting?
I have a lot of experience too, so it's not hard at all. It's rather not doing it that would be harder... A-Anyway, can it be that you find it interesting to strip for someone and watch others strip?

condition.saying: You look like you could be a superhero of some kind!

case.state: Well, I am a superhero. I'm a goddess, and I do fight monsters to protect the citizens of my country. But with your wings, you look like a goddess too... or should I say god. But I guess you aren't one.

It's true that it takes a lot of skill and effort if you want your country always to be the best one and have the most shares. I couldn't carry on without a few relaxing hobbies... But this isn't really why I'm here...
It's true that to make your country as prosperous as Lastation, it takes all kinds of skills and tons of stressful work. Playing a strip game isn't what I'd normally do to unwind, though...

You could say so, Gloria... But since you're playing with us to~background.time~, it's not like you actively avoid gaming either. If you try a few console games, I'm sure you'll find something you like.
It doesn't sound very majestic when you put it like that, Rarity, but I'd rather be a paperwork goddess than a lazy goddess.
You'll never get to know, ~streamingchan~. Nor any of your viewers.
What do they mean? As a goddess, I should be at the top in any hierarchy.
Uh... That's uncomfortable, ~streamingchan~... I don't remember my father.
Where do you even get your viewers from?!
Must fanart be like that? Can't people paint a few solemn religious icons of me for a change?
What?! Obviously, I'd rather fight the horses! I'd fell them all with one slash of the Tornado Sword.
Are your shows only for total degenerates, ~streamingchan~?
I-I don't have any kinky fantasies... Just a few very... v-vanilla ones, really...
Sorry, but I'm not going to accept every request from your viewers.
I-I'm working on that, okay?
A big tiddy moth? I have no idea how you come up with your questions, ~streamingchan~, but I'd rather you talked about humans.
I-I wouldn't tell you and your viewers anyway.
That's something that the partner should decide on for ~player.ifMale(himself|herself)~. I wouldn't demand anything.
Uhm... I haven't, and I won't, but I'm sure some of my citizens would buy it.
They're secret even to me, but maybe someone will help me discover them...
Things like that aren't something to brag about publicly.

state.text: I can become the best at whatever I want to, but I have no obligation to show it to you! {vsmall}...But maybe it'd be fun to show it to {!reset}{ivsmall}someone else...{!reset}

case.state: Don't call me lonely! I do have a friend---I mean, lots of friends---so there!
Would I ever if? If what? I don't get what you're saying, ~streamingchan~.
Do we really look like that? Ehehe~ ...Uhm... I meant to say, we aren't dating at all, and, anyway, who would accept a date with strip poker in it? I'm just here on a... quest! That's right.

It's not easy to explain, Wikipe-tan. Histoire is an artificial being, who looks like a small girl. She records the whole history of Gamindustri and can do almost everything if you give her three days to think it over. She created the portal through which I came here, too.

That's right, ~mari~! It's mostly pop rock. If I were a full-time idol, I'd learn to play the guitar too, but I'm not, so I just sing and dance. I like how in a song I can express my feelings easier. People will think it's just how the lyrics go.

Yes, I am, ~mari~. It's simple pop rock, but I like how it allows me to open my heart. I can be honest with my feelings, and no one is going to think that the lyrics have any deeper meaning behind them anyway.

Right, ~mari~, my sister Uni is a bit shorter than me and wears a two-side-up hairstyle. I don't know if I'm a good sister, though... I want all the best for her, but maybe she thinks I don't love her.
Well... My sister Uni looks similar to me but is a bit shorter and puts only a part of her hair up. I wish I were a better sister, though. I really love her, but I'm unable to convey it.

I'm not uptight, ~kumatora~. I'm just not careless. But it's nice to hear that you like my clothes. This is my favorite style, so it makes me happy to know that someone from another world can appreciate it too.
There is a difference between being relaxed and being lax, ~kumatora~. I simply never lose my focus. I'm glad you like what I'm wearing, though.
What do you mean, Y'shtola? Isn't it good if a goddess isn't a remote ethereal being but someone close to her people?
Thank you, Y'shtola! Boots like these are very practical, so you should definitely buy a pair if you have a chance.
{small}Do we look like friends already?{!reset} Ehehe~ ......I-I-It's not like that! But we... do have some history. ~Player.subj~'s helped me a few times as an... advisor. Right, a trusted advisor.
It depends on the country. Everyone in Lastation much prefers a goddess like me. Besides, a flowing dress would look great on me too!
I don't mind being called cutesy, Jura. Everyone in my country loves this style, and I wear flowing dresses too sometimes, on formal occasions.

On many days I am busy from dawn till dusk, but I'm certainly not alone! I have my trusty right-hand woman Kei---who communicates my will to my ministers---and my sister Uni, who is starting to become competent enough to share some of my work.
