In the drama club, do you normally borrow the costumes from somewhere or do you make them yourselves?
I'm wondering... In your drama club, who normally takes care of the costumes required for the plays?
You know some of my songs even though I'm only a part-time idol, which makes me even more sorry not to know any of yours. Can you recommend me a few?
I know it's just your first item, but you seem a little too happy to lose, Mari. Don't tell me that's actually your plan for to~background.time~.
You don't look disappointed at all, Mari. Do you really want to lose your clothes?

condition.saying: It's finally time! Are you ready, Tess!?

state.text: "It's finally time"? Aren't you too eager to strip, girls?

case.state: What exactly is the level of technology in your homeworld, Meia? I see it's enough for interplanetary travel, but is it also sufficient for the production of intelligent robots?
Earth seems to be a technological backwater, but you surely come from a more developed world. Does it have factories of autonomous robots?
You lost this round, ~leon~... I'm not demanding anything, but... I've taken off my panties when you asked, and... I've heard that seeing each other naked may deepen friendship, s-so...

Since you're an older sister to~background.time~, why don't you give me advice on friendship... or more...?
If you like someone, how to make them notice you? {small}...This might be a good opportunity to learn something.{!reset}

state.text: You've mentioned your military training, ~hilda~, so what is your weapon of choice? You'd look cool with a sword or a spear, your twintails fluttering in the wind! Ehehe~
I'd never sacrifice my mobility, so I prefer a rapier to a heavy two-hander. For the same reason, two pistols are better than a rifle. Am I right, Revy?

case.state: I prefer swords, but if I were to be a gunner, I'd use two handguns, just like you. They look cool and don't hinder movements like a rifle. Is that why you chose them?
You mentioned coming here from a different planet. What does interplanetary travel look like in your world, Jura?
If you're not from Earth, Jura, then how did you get here? Surely, in a different way than I...
If you don't mind my asking, what acts of piracy do you perform, Fina? You look too gentle to pillage a village and not nerdy enough to copy DRM-protected video games.
What exactly is your job as an Air Pirate, Fina? You look like a respectable person, unlikely to take part in raiding ships and coasts... let alone selling illegal copies of video games.

state.text: Kyou, I like how serious you are with this game, but where does your confidence come from? Are you a member of an after-school bridge club? Or maybe... a video game club?
I like your attitude so far, Kyou. Do you play games in an after-school club?

case.state: The effort you put into learning this language paid off, Petra. Your idiolect is both perfectly understandable and very cute.

You must have worked very hard to learn this language, Petra, but it was time well spent. The few remaining quirks in the way you talk don't hinder comprehension. The only thing they do is make you sound cuter.
Petra, your dignified posture and your elaborate braid tell me that you're not a commoner or a mere NPC. Am I correct?
Your complex hairstyle adds to your overall noble look, Petra. You're surely not a minor character in your world, right?
It seems Aimee really has it under control, so I'll let her continue... but it still makes me feel uneasy...
Nadia, I've been observing your accessories since we came here. They're so well made, especially the tail! Did you get them here on Earth or do you come from another world like me?
Nadia, your accessories are amazing! The ears and tail look just like the real thing. I didn't expect you could find anything like that on Earth. I haven't seen this quality even in Gamindustri!

state.text: I've just remembered the name of that girl I mentioned before! We called her "Underling", but her name was actually Linda! I'll call you the same, if you don't mind.
The "Underling" girl you remind me of actually had a name! I've just remembered! Her name was Linda! I can call you the same, if you want.

case.state: Do you think a distinguished, mature woman like you will have fun playing a slightly silly game like this? I'd expect you to opt for more serious and peaceful entertainment. Maybe whist, Canasta, or one of casual games from Lowee?
(Ai-chan is at her cutest right now... I wish she didn't strip anymore and just started the forfeit directly... Ehehe~)
You can stay with us and just play regular poker, Flutter. I'm sure no one will have a problem with being watched by a butterfly.
Wait... What are you doing with your gun!? Throw it down at once!

Barbara, was it? I like your hairstyle! It reminds me of my younger sister Uni's HDD form, Black Sister. People of Lastation gave her that title because she's a sibling of a goddess. You're a sister as well---a religious sister, am I right?

Your drill twintails are very cute! My younger sister Uni likes that style too... She's officially called Black Sister by my believers because she's a sibling of a goddess, but your hat and your daily prayers make me think you should be called "sister" too, if for a different reason.
I love huge ribbons like yours, Noelle! Do you work in a maid cafe?
You're a maid, so you must have dropped your tray and spilled the drinks many times, right? That's simply necessary!

state.text: A maid's service wouldn't be complete without occasional accidents, slips and spills! Am I correct, Noelle?
Most people would be disappointed if a maid didn't trip and drop her tray from time to time. Am I right, Noelle?

case.state: I prefer to be unencumbered by steel, even in battle, but your costume is as cute as possible for a plate armor. Did you design it all by yourself?
No one wears armor like that in Gamindustri, but you made it look really cute. Was it all your design?

Your costume and your mic suggest to me that you're a music idol. I'm a fan of 5pb., who is the top idol in Leanbox, but I'm sorry not to know almost any songs from Earth. Can you recommend me some of yours?
~Hu_tao~, do you think love transcends death, and ghosts, which you're so familiar with, may still feel it?
~Hu_tao~, you seem knowledgeable about ghosts. Do you know if they can still feel love?

I was mortal once, and afraid of becoming old. I put all my efforts into the search for a legendary artifact, the Goddess Memory. I found it, attained divinity, and founded the country I rule. If you heard about such an artifact, would you spend years looking for it?
In my dimension, godhood and immortality is attained by consuming the Goddess Memory. I don't think another such artifact exists, but if it did, would you spend your life in search for it?
You seemed surprised to be here. Didn't ~player~ invite you?
Why were you so surprised to be here, Natsuki? What was it that you expected?
~Player~ seems like a pretty avid reader, but what exactly do you and ~player.obj~ do as members of the Literature Club?
I heard that ~player~ helped Blanc once with one of her novels, but I didn't expect ~player.obj~ to be quite that interested in literature. What exactly do you do in your club?
Natsuki, do you have hobbies apart from reading and writing?
Natsuki, is reading and writing everything for you, or do you have other hobbies too?
Natsuki, exactly how long have you known ~player~?
Could you tell me when you got to know ~player~, Natsuki?

state.text: You're getting cuter the more you strip... I like your two-side-up hairstyle! Have you considered letting your hair grow longer, beyond the shoulders?
With each lost item, you're getting cuter, Natsuki... Your two-side-up pink hair is very cute too, but have you thought about letting it grow longer?
I wonder if your bra matches your strawberry panties...
Natsuki, I can't wait to see more of that strawberry pattern...
You didn't really need to wear a bra in the first place... I doubt Blanc wears one under her dresses...
It's not like you really needed that bra, Natsuki. Blanc has a similar figure, and she probably doesn't wear one with any of her dresses...
Your guard has been completely broken. Will you accept your defeat now?
You're getting naked now, Natsuki, and I'm going to cruise toward victory.

case.state: Your voice is slightly synth-sounding. Are you perhaps a cyborg?
Miku, as an experienced idol, could you give me some advice?
I like your thigh-highs so much. It's a shame you have to take them off.

Heris, is it? Why are you wearing a lab coat to this game? Are you a workaholic and didn't have time to change clothes, or do you just like it as a costume? You can answer honestly both options sound good to me!
Heris, can you explain to me your outfit choice? Were you so absorbed in doing science that you didn't have time to change clothes, or do you just love that lab look? I can appreciate either answer!

Colress, was it? What's that thing you keep looking at once and again? Is it a portable game console? Don't tell me this game isn't exciting enough for you, and you're playing another one simultaneously!
That looks like a portable game console! Colress, maybe you're even more of a gamer than I if this game isn't enough for you, and you're playing another one at the same time!

Colress, do you want to take part in a scientific conference in Lastation? I could arrange that for you. I bet scientists from different worlds have a lot to learn from each other... But you have to promise never to mention how we met!
Colress, if you want to visit Lastation and participate in a scientific conference, maybe I can arrange it for you... But only if you promise not to say a word about our game to~background.time~!
Since you've lost this round, ~dust~, how about taking off your hat? Keeping a poker face is easy if people can't see your eyes.
~Dust~, you have to remove something. Don't you think it'd be a good idea to start with your hat? In a game like this, not showing where you're looking at seems unfair.
With a hat like that, can you see other people's faces at all, or do you only look at their bodies? Why don't you take it off, ~dust~? You've just lost, so it's a perfect opportunity for that.
Ringo, you mentioned a game you play---Puyo, was it?---Is it a video game, or is it more like an outdoors sport?
Ringo, is the game you mentioned you play a console game or rather a kind of an outdoors sport?
I can't believe this is only your first loss, Mari. Are you just pretending to be okay with stripping but are actually trying very hard to win?
It's more than a bit disconcerting to see a schoolgirl who behaves like you. I wouldn't allow for such lax morals if I were a member of your school's student council.
Do you act like that at school too? I can't imagine the disciplinary committee tolerating it.
You strike me as that type of a character... Are you the president of the student council or something, Monika?
You have that iinchou-type aura about you, Monika. Do I guess correctly that you're the president of your school's student council... or maybe of the disciplinary committee?

state.text: Yuri, have you tried wearing glasses as a fashion accessory? I sometimes wear a pair as a disguise, but you can trust me that they'd suit your look perfectly!
Have you ever checked how you'd look wearing glasses, Yuri? I, for one, would love to see that.

case.state: Yuri, was it? ...Are you sure you'll be okay playing this game? I'll stay only until ~player~ withdraws, and remember that you can leave at any time too.

You don't seem like someone who'd play games of this kind. Are you sure you'll be okay? I'll stay in the game as long as ~player~ does, but you can leave even before that if you lose more items than you're comfortable with.

Sayori, right? It's clear that you're a cheerful and gregarious girl, who must know a lot about making friends. Could you share some tips about how to do it? ...Obviously, I'm asking for ~player~, not for myself...

Sayori... You're surely a happy, extrovert girl. But now you lost, so in addition to stripping, why don't you tell us a secret? For example: What's a good way of making friends? ...I know everything about it myself, but maybe ~player~ doesn't...
At least your shoes and stockings are gone, so you're not going to flash your panties at ~player~ again.
I hope you won't find an excuse to flash your panties at ~player~ for the third time.
It's quite obvious to me that you're a gamer, Asuna. But I'm a gamer goddess, so don't imagine you'll stand too much of a chance.
You're clearly a gamer, Asuna, but do you think you can win against a gamer goddess?
Most gamers have a favorite genre, like Vert and MMORPG or my sister and FPS. What is yours?

Favorite game genres differ wildly between people and even between countries. I guess you're not a casual who'd play games from Lowee, for example. What kind of games do you prefer? Any specific titles?
I heard you mention you have a boyfriend. I'm not particularly interested in love... But could you tell me more about him, and what it feels like to be together?
Asuna, personally, I don't care much about love or things like that... But tell me how you feel when you're together with your boyfriend. What kind of person is he?
I acknowledge that you're a skilled gamer, Asuna. But I'm a gamer goddess, so don't imagine you'll win so easily. Maybe I'm just going to start a winning streak.
You're a really skilled gamer, Asuna, to build up such an advantage over a gamer goddess. The game still isn't over, though.
I like your style, though, ~mari_setogaya~. I only ever wear shorts as sportswear, but I do admit they too go really well with thigh-highs!
~Player~, don't you think it's unfair to play strip poker against someone who barely knows the rules? ...I'd say you don't have to strip this round, Hilda.
~Player~, when you invited Hilda, did you know that she was a total beginner at poker? She should be allowed to play along for a few rounds without stripping---until she at least learns the hands!
Tell me more about your world, Y'shtola. Magic is more prevalent in it than in ~player~'s, correct? Does it coexist with advanced technology?
You come from a magical world, and I sense you're a powerful sorcerer yourself, Y'shtola. What forms of magic do you use?

state.text: Sailing might be romantic and relaxing, but wouldn't you prefer to navigate a flying ship, Nami? Don't you think it'd make your exploration much easier?
Exploring the world in a sailing ship must be pretty slow. If you could choose, wouldn't you prefer a flying one, Nami?

case.state: Nami, you spend days and nights in the middle of the sea together with your crew, correct? Has it made it easier for you to make friends among them?
Nami, what is it like to sail for days on end together with the same group of people? Does it make it easier for you to become friends?
You're from this dimension, aren't you, Mari? Can you tell me something I should know about this world? I've only visited it a few times.

I've been to this world---~player~'s world---several times, but I'm sure you know it way better than I do, Mari. Can you share with me an interesting fact or just something that I might be ignorant of?
Are you looking for a goddess to worship, Mari? I'm the most gifted and diligent among the goddesses of Gamindustri, so there is no one better than me to put your faith in. I only do everything.
I don't know what your religious beliefs are, Mari, but you should consider becoming a follower of mine instead. You can see I'm a goddess who doesn't keep aloof from those who have earned her favor.
Are you a religious person, Mari? Now that you're seeing a goddess with your own eyes, you can't really be an atheist, can you?
Would goddesses from your world do this much for their believers? Probably not. So why don't you become my worshiper instead, Mari?
That's a nice style you're rocking! A hairstyle and clothes like yours would be very popular in my country. I'm almost tempted to call you Black instead of Blake. Hehe~
You'd be popular in Lastation, with the way you dress and with your hair color. Blake... Black... Even your name kind of fits the theme. Hehe~
~Mari_setogaya~, do you have any other pastimes apart from... you know?
~Mari_setogaya~, engaging in a... sexual intercourse... cannot be your only hobby, right? You surely have some more proper ones too?
You said something about the guiding wind... What exactly is the deity you serve, Barbara, and what kind of favors do you obtain for your faith and prayers?
I gather you don't worship a goddess, but rather... the wind? What kind of a deity is that? Does it bestow any favors on you for all your religious service?
Shamir, right? I heard you mention a monastery. Do you work for a goddess, then? Maybe you help her fight monsters with your bow and arrows?
Shamir---is it?---I heard you say you came from a monastery. Does it mean you work for a goddess and help her maintain peace in your country? Maybe you even support her in battle?
Gloria, is it? I teleported here from another dimension, yet somehow I feel like you're a visitor from an even more remote place. Where exactly do you come from?
Your costume is simple, Rarity, yet those gemstones here and there really make it shine! Do you only design clothes or also make them?

state.text: What's that coffer here for? Is it like in those RPGs where a treasure chest opens after you beat whoever defends it?
What's the treasure chest doing here? Is this a card-game-RPG crossover, and the coffer is a reward for beating you?

case.state: Wikipe-tan... An acquaintance of mine, MAGES, has a dot as a part of her name. Is it the same with that -tan of yours, or do you call yourself that because you think it'll help you make friends?
Is that what's called "beginner's luck", or is my luck so abysmal?

Nami... do you know anyone with experience in hunting whales? They sometimes attack people in my world, so the guilds issue missions to fight them. The rewards are good, but the whales fly over land, so you'd likely need a flying ship to pursue them.

Whales are supposed to be water animals, right, Nami? In my world they fly over land, and they're very dangerous when they migrate. The guild issues missions to fight them. Do you know someone or something that could help?
I'd prefer my opponents to be more serious... But maybe a clown actually is serious when she's doing her job?

Eichi.. W-Why are you blushing so much all the time? I hope it's not because of temperature... But if you're already so embarrassed---or excited---then maybe you shouldn't play a game like this! Remember that you can withdraw whenever you want.

Eichi... That constant erubescence of yours... I hope you're feeling well and don't have a fever. But if you're already so flushed with embarrassment---or excitement---that's a bit awkward too! Maybe this game is just too intense for you.

~Mari_setogaya~... You have experience in... physical love, but... Do you believe in true love? That bitter and sweet feeling that {small}makes you care about the other person the most and want to be together with them no matter what?{!reset} ...Y-Yes or no?

~Mari_setogaya~... You're experienced in... intercourse, but... Have you ever truly loved anyone? So much that you {small}could do anything for that person and wanted them to be always by your side?{!reset} ...H-Have you, or have you not?
A thief wouldn't say she's a thief. Unless it's a role playing game, and she wants to form a party to explore a dungeon together... C-Can it be that you are looking for new teammates, ~rouge~?

A treasure hunter or a thief stating her profession so openly is like something taken straight from an RPG. They'd tell their class and skills to their potential teammates... I-Is that what you have in mind, ~rouge~?

state.text: Let me guess: Another pair of underwear?
I wonder what the pattern on your next pair of underwear is going to be.

case.state: You're an eccentric person if even I saw one, ~bobobo~, but your fashion sense is... pretty good. Your outfit will have to become incomplete now, though. Such are the rules.
You appear to have more fashion sense than common sense, ~bobobo~... Much more, even, though it's not difficult in your case. But the rules say that you have to remove an item of clothing now.

You were very lucky to keep your outfit intact for so many rounds, ~bobobo~, but now you have to remove one item! I don't expect you to follow all the rules, but if you want to stay in the game, you have to follow this one at least.
Granted, costumes in which I fight are a bit skimpy, but they cover everything they should. Now, this is waaay too much fanservice, don't you think?!
I know something about fighting in skimpy costumes and offering fanservice, but don't you think that covering only your face and extremities takes it waaay too far?!
Are you known under any other name, or is it just Aqua?
Are you called Aqua by your believers, or do you have another, more official name too?
You're saying you're an agent, but it doesn't really tell me what your job is about. You do carry a gun, but you're closer to being a spy than a soldier, aren't you, Leon?
Your Earth seems to be a more troubled place than ~player~'s Earth. How did it end up in that state?
I can imagine what fighting against those bioweapons of yours is like, Leon. When I was a student, I played in two amateur zombie movies.
...Isn't your T-shirt one size too small, Leon? I wear tight-fitting costumes too but still. Men don't usually showcase all of their body lines like that.

state.text: You should start thinking of an escape plan, ~leon~, shouldn't you?

case.state: ~Leon~, you usually work alone, correct? Or do you have a partner or something? ...I mean, on your missions...
You lost this round, ~leon~... I'm not demanding anything, but... you've watched me take off my panties, and... I've heard that seeing each other naked may deepen friendship, s-so...

It was nice playing with you, ~leon~, but you see that I'm just too good at games. It's high time you gave up.
If you still want to play on, then... well, the rules permit it, but...

Congrats for putting up a very good fight, ~leon~, but it's nearing its end...
If you still want to continue, then I... I won't stop you from doing so...
Tell me more about your sister, ~hilda~. Can you always find a common language? I think it's not always easy...
Robin, how much is known about this world's history? Were there any ancient civilizations that researched magic or high technology? Maybe they left some powerful artifacts behind them.
So, Robin, do you know a lot about this world's history? Can there be any magical artifacts yet to be found in some old ruins? Or something like an awesome, long-lost technology!
Suzuya the heavy cruiser? I've met someone like that in another dimension, and we were almost like friends! We had a few conversations about storms and the weather.
I've met a shipgirl named Suzuya before! Could it have been you but from a different dimension?

state.text: Your red eyes and your fashion sense... They tell me that you must be really popular where you come from, Yunyun.

case.state: Hilda, you seem to be a sociable type, so I wonder: Can you give me advice on friendship... or more...? Hypothetically, if there is someone you like, how to make them notice you?
"~Player~"? Do you mean, like, a chess master? No? That's what I thought.
My actor skills are top notch. I could easily play a maid if I wanted to. But don't get carried away, "~player~".
"~Player~"? You're another Iris Heart type or what?
My actor skills are top notch, I could even play a maid if I wanted to. But don't get carried away, "~player~".
Hehe~ I won! You played so well that for a moment I thought you had special powers, but you're only human after all.
Hehe~ I won! For a moment I thought you had some uncanny supernatural powers, but you're only human after all.
You remind me of one of my friends. Like you, she has blue eyes and... a slender physique. Even her name is similar to yours.
Maybe I'll take a shower after the game. After everyone leaves, of course...
The lake is quite pretty and serene. Don't you think so?
The lake is quite pretty and serene.
Maybe I'll take a shower after the game.
~Player~ is so happy with ~player.poss~ ~player.hand.noart~. Ehehe~... No, I'm not enjoying seeing it at all! We're opponents!
~Player.hand~!? That's an amazing hand, ~player~! Congratulations!
~Player~ looks so happy when ~player.subj~'s winning. Ehehe~
You're still completely clothed, ~player~... I'm OK with that, but if you bared at least your chest, it'd make me feel even hotter.
You're still completely clothed, ~player~... I'm OK with that, but if you showed at least your underwear, it'd make me feel even hotter.
I still can't believe how you could start the game like that, especially with guys around.
We're all girls, so maybe you don't feel that embarrassed... I really hope you wouldn't dress in such an exhibitionist fashion if there were guys around, though.
Gamindustri isn't exactly known for prudishness of its inhabitants, but your ~background.time~'s outfit is a bit too much even for me.
I do like fanservice, but you should make people wait for it and tease them a little, not show everything right from the start.
~Player~, you should value yourself more and not dress in such an exhibitionist fashion. Maybe my clothes could be called revealing too, but there is still a large difference.
Don't you ever cover your... nether parts, ~player~?

~Player~, I'm already almost naked, and you haven't even lost once... It's embarrassing, but at the same time I'm happy seeing that you're so strong in your world. If you win without losing a round, I'll... kiss you after the game! Hehe~

~Player~, I'm already naked, and you haven't even lost once... It's embarrassing, but at the same time I'm happy seeing that you're so strong in your world. If you win without losing a round, I'll... kiss you after the game! Hehe~
Come to think of it, your nickname is very silly. What's even worse, it might be too long to fit in my speech bubbles. I'll call you something else.
Yes, ~player~, I've taken off my panties, but I didn't really do it for you. Don't feel obliged to get naked too. Just take off your jacket or something.
You can see me without my panties, but I still don't want you to do anything you'd feel uncomfortable with. I'll understand if you choose to withdraw now.
Twintails are the cutest hairstyle! I'm sure they're just as popular in your world!
Twintails are absolutely the best! There was a time I would loosen my hair when in my HDD form, but now I tie my hair in twintails even as Black Heart.
Your hair is just like my sister Uni's! I always tie my hair up in twintails, but two-side-up is a great hairstyle too!
Strong muscles doesn't mean much in a world with magic, but still I do find a body such as ~target~'s attractive...
I wonder how it feels to be hugged by someone as well-built as ~target~...
A girl doesn't need a ton of muscles, especially if she knows magic... But they look pretty good on you.
This is a game I'd rather not play against Plutia, or Iris Heart, and you have a similar aura, ~target~... but at least you're not a goddess, so I should be safe, I hope.

You look like a gamer. Have you played Four Goddesses Online? In my world it's among the most popular MMORPGs. Some things seem to transcend world boundaries, and I'm wondering if games do so as well.

In a world where supernatural powers are rare, muscularity is supposed to be correlated with physical strength, right? It doesn't matter much in my dimension, though. You could just look at Tekken-chan to see what I mean.
In a battle, nimbleness will win over brute force.
Your hair is like that of Purple Heart, Neptune's HDD form. Both in looks and behavior, that form is an incredible upgrade over her normal self.
Yeah, ~target~, success in this game depends on luck more than on brains.
~Target~, don't think I'm grateful to you for losing this round in my place, OK?
That's a pretty uniform! It reminds me of the time when I was a student in Gamicademy. I was elected vice president of the student council... though I'm not really an iinchou-type.
(After the game, I'll ask ~target~ if she would let me try her uniform. I haven't wore anything like that since I was a student in Gamicademy.)
Your uniform reminds me of the time I was a student in Gamicademy... You aren't a zombie by any chance? Haha~
My world is brimming with idols, such as my friend 5pb-chan. I too performed as an idol a few times {vsmall}(and I'd rather not count the videos uploaded as Mahou Shoujo Idol Magical Noirin).{!reset}
~Player~ worked as my idol manager for a few weeks, but in fact I had been pretty successful even before that, you know, ~target~?

state.text: I'd like to take a closer look at your gun after the game. I'm not that interested in it myself, but I'd love to tell Uni about it.

case.state: I fight with a sword, but my sister is a firearm freak. She'd love to inspect your gun if she were here.
My sister collects antique firearms. Maybe she'd want your gun for her collection too. Ahaha~

Wow, you're a cyborg! Steamax, Affimojas, Brave the Hard, and many others of your kind fought me, but they became kinda friendly after getting their metal ass served to them. I wouldn't mind if it's like that with you too.
I feel that as a cyborg you may be similar to Affimojas and prefer blondes with huge breasts... but maybe you'll learn to prefer black twintails yet.
A robot once hit on my sister. No really!
I love your hair color! My hair is like that when I transform into Black Heart, my Hard Drive Divinity form.
Black hair is always a favorite in Lastation... Of course, depending on lighting it may also seem dark blue.
You're a musician? I know how to play the guitar, but I prefer singing. I can't really do both at the same time, like 5pb-chan.
So. you're a musician? My friend 5pb-chan is an idol who sings and plays the guitar. I'd never attempt to copy her weird techniques, such as pulling the strings with your teeth!
You can leave the game whenever you want, ~target~, but I'd like you to stay for a few rounds. You won't have to take off anything big, so just use this as an opportunity to overcome your fears.
Don't worry, ~target~. You're already showing a lot of courage just by playing, so it's fine if you take off something small.
Serves you right.
Hold your horses and calmly strip when it's your turn. I won't tolerate any aggression.
Calm down and just strip! Or leave the game if you have any complaints.
Somehow, looking at you makes me think of Uzume, a friend of mine. She tries acting cool and speaks like a boy, but she's still a girl inside and shows it when she forgets to put on an act.
Your green hair reminds me of Chika, Vert's oracle. She's as classy and sexy as the goddess she serves.

state.text: I sometimes dye my hair pink to match the pink version of this outfit. But usually, I leave my hair black. Even a magical girl doesn't need that much pink, much less a goddess.

case.state: Your hair reminds me of Black Cat Princess. We both were beta-testers for Four Goddesses Online. I love her costume and style, and now she's also learning a lot about fair play. I just hope she's not a middle-aged man playing as a girl.

Your hair reminds me of Black Cat Princess. We both were beta-testers for Four Goddesses Online. I love her costume and style, and now she's also learning a lot about fair play. I just hope she's not a middle-aged man playing as a girl.
A swimsuit is an unusual outfit choice for strip poker, but at least ~target~ won't have to show ~target.poss~ underwear.
It kind of makes sense to wear a swimsuit for strip poker. It's less embarrassing to show than underwear.
Did you guess I had bad cards and decided to throw this round for my sake? How silly... {small}But... I appreciate it, ~player~......{!reset}{vsmall} Thank you.{!reset}
You can already see my naked breasts, ~player~, but it's true you earned it in a fair game. I'm fine with you taking off any item you want.
You still lost, even to such a weak hand? ~Player~, don't tell me you're throwing on purpose!
How is it possible that I'm naked while you're still fully clothed, ~player~?
I'm completely naked while you're still fully clothed. I'm curious, is that a kind of situation you dreamed about, ~player~?

~Player~, you still have so many clothes left... This must be the only game at which you're more skilled than I. Could you teach me some strategies after we finish? You surely wouldn't... prefer me not to improve?
You're playing so badly... Don't tell me that you actually want to lose...
You know, ~player~, touching myself for you when you're fully clothed is exciting in its own way... but perhaps if you showed some skin, it would make it sliiiightly less embarrassing.
I still haven't even seen you in your underwear, ~player~.
Mmmh... ~Player~, I'm happy when you win, but maybe I'm even more happy when you lose...
What will you show me, ~player~? Ehehe~
Strip while looking at me, ~player~...
Don't worry about the onlookers, ~player~, get naked and come join me!
Well, ~player~? What will you strip?
Don't think I'm all that happy to see you a little bit more naked.
Well, ~player~? What will you pick now that it's your turn to strip?
Well, I have shown you a lot already...
I showed you everything I could. Do you think I too deserve to see something?
This game was your idea, so I expect you to play fair.
Well, I won this round. You shouldn't be surprised.
So it goes, ~player~.
Nothing unexpected.
It wasn't I who invented the rules.
Remember that you can always withdraw from the game, ~player~.
You set the rules, ~player~, so you should follow them.
Even if you lose, you've already proven that you're a formidable poker player.
Don't worry, ~player~, even the best gamers can lose from time to time... like me... right?
You'll probably remove something so small that nobody will even notice the difference.
As I said, I won't give you any handicap.
You might come to regret wearing so little to the game.
Strip whatever you want, ~player~.

I know someone with crimson hair. Fittingly, her name is RED. She's short but curvy and always wants to find a wife, or even wives, as she says, for herself. I hope you're playing this game just for fun and not for any matrimonial purpose.
You're not unbeatable, ~target~.
I can still win.
Don't get overconfident, ~target~.
I was unlucky a few times, but I'm still a goddess, so you better not get overconfident, ~target~.
It's like beating Abnes... who's weaker than a dogoo.
It's as easy as fighting dogoos... and I don't even mean the clothes-dissolving ones.
You might come to regret starting with so few pieces of clothing.
You're not in an enviable situation, but you know the rules.
Will you show at least your underwear, ~target~?
It's not like I demand any solidarity, but it would make me less embarrassed if you showed at least your underwear, ~player~.
Will you do for me as much as I did for you, ~player~?
I needed this win more than you.
A seven high? My congratulations. It's like the polar opposite of a straight flush.
A seven high? You could've hardly gotten a worse hand even if you had tried.
This is what you get for thinking that ~target.hand~ should always suffice.
A pair is a decent hand, ~target~, but not ~target.hand~.
If you play against a decent opposition, you shouldn't imagine that just any pair will do it.
If you think this hand was good, then you should see my special moves. Maybe Volcano Dive or Lacy Dance...
You got five cards, could swap any of them, and didn't even get a queen or a king?
With an ace high, you could have hoped to win. Not so much with ~target.hand~.
~Target.hand~. Can you even get a hand like that without trying? Swapping is allowed, you know?
OK, I get it. I'll strip... huh? I won? With this hand?...... Yeah, of course I did. I knew I would.
You can bring a sword to a gun fight and still win! That's what I always do.
I was fortunate to win despite having such a horrible hand... but fortune favors the strong.
Now I have to keep winning even with bad cards.
I... won this round.
I'm not following the game all that closely right now...aah...Who lost?
Mhmm...ah...
I was... absorbed in my own thoughts... Is it ~target~'s turn to strip?
Don't disappoint me, ~target~.
If you help me by stripping something big, ~target~, then maybe you'll be able to see better action in return.
No time to be bashful, ~target~, show something already.
Wait no longer, ~target~, show some good stuff.
Yes... you lost, ~target~, now show everything!
You're already showing all that's important, ~target~...
Why don't you help me get this started for real?
I recommend you to withdraw now, ~target~.
You lost the game, so you have to withdraw now. Right?
Headshot! As Uni would say.
Yeah, I won this round. I've escaped from worse predicaments than this... {small}Although I always had at least some clothes on...{!reset}
Don't attempt to deny that you've been looking at me in an indecent way, ~target~. Maybe a few losses will make you know your place again.
(Are ~target~ and I friends already? ...I certainly got to know him better... But this level of exposure is surely uncommon even among friends...)
I wish I had that much luck a few rounds earlier...
Sometimes, my clothes get damaged in battle, but never to leave me completely naked...
(There is no such thing as men's lingerie... or is there?)
I'm happy only because I won and certainly not because I'm interested in seeing another inch of your body. Don't get too cocky.
At this early stage of the game, you probably aren't going to remove anything substantial anyway, so get on with it quickly and let's move on.
I bet seeing me like this makes it harder for you to focus on the cards, ~target~.
I want to win, so of course I want you to get naked and lose, ~target~. I'm sure this desire is reciprocal, too.
Fufun
I hope you won't disappoint me with your choice, ~target~.
You've seen all of me, so don't be shy.
You lost the round, ~target~, but don't take this game too seriously.
(Maybe soon ~target~ will get completely naked... Am I really ready to see it?)
I already have a lot to look at, but I'd love to see you nude too, ~target~.
~Target~ will join me very soon!
With Laplace Eye, I can see hidden items... but it does not make clothes transparent, so I still can't see what you're hiding underneath them... though I'd very much like to.
I'd appreciate it if you got naked sooner rather than later...
After what you've already seen, it should be easier for you to strip now.
Just watching and not having to worry about cards anymore is fun too.
I hope for even more fun, ~target~.
Seeing a girl undress is basically the point of strip poker, isn't it?
As a girl, you surely didn't get distracted by seeing me in my underwear? ...Or did you?
You're already showing a lot, ~target~, so I can't wait to see what comes next.
Show us even more, ~target~.
(I feel like ~target~ and I are already friends... I hope she feels the same... If so, then going to an onsen together and seeing each others' naked body wouldn't be very strange...)
Another... easy victory... yeah...
Show us what you've got, ~target~.
I can't wait to see what comes off next.
Give us some fanservice, ~target~.
Hooray for ~player~!
Look here, ~player~, for your additional prize this round!
Win this game for me, ~player~! But if you lose, it's okay too. You'll just join me down here.
Well played, ~player~!
Look here, ~player~, for your additional prize this round!
You've got to get up pretty early in the morning to outdo a hard-working goddess like me.
In the name of the Lastation Basilicom, I will punish you! Uh, forget it. That sounded embarrassing.
Don't pretend you didn't see it coming, ~target~.
An easy victory.
I'm not expecting to get a medal for such an easy victory.
Too simple.
An easy victory... naturally.
Better you than me, ~target~.
Haha! The fewer clothes, the more important every round feels!
Now I can really feel how thrilling this game is.
Fu-fun
Yes! I haven't forgotten how to win!
I can't afford to lose any rounds now.
If you expected to win, you came to the wrong dimension.
Sorry, but I have to start a winning streak now.
To be able to corner me like that... You're a boss opponent, and I should get a medal after beating you.
Maybe I am still able to win.
I wasn't paying attention... is it ~target~'s turn now?
Of course you came here prepared to strip, right, ~target~? Then, there is no excuse for you to hesitate.
You chose to play this game of your own volition, ~target~, so don't complain if you have to strip.
Flawless victory!
If you want to see girls take off their clothes, then better focus on the cards, ~target~.
You won't see us girls strip if you lose your focus like that.
I'm happy that you're watching me all the time and still playing so well, ~player~.
It's my victory again! Will you now... um... start the forfeit or...?
Soon ~target~ will join me!
My LUK stat might be low, but don't underestimate my INT.
My LUK stat might be low, but don't underestimate my INT.
I wouldn't care about you stripping or not if not for the fact that I need it to win.
With me in this state, it should be easier for you to strip now...
Now it's your turn to get naked and feel the same as I do, ~target~.
It's not that I want you to strip, but I even more don't want you not to strip.

...N-Nowaaa?!
Hmm...
Or maybe not...
...Well...
I see. We can at least visit neighboring countries in summer, be it Leanbox or Derdriu. So, Goneril Duchy is the name of the country you live in, correct? Can you describe it for me in a few words?

Derdriu? Many people can't even pronounce "Neptune" properly, so "Derdriu" would be just impossible! No problem for me, of course~ ...But you live in Goneril Duchy, right? What it's like, and... what's the duke like?

state.text: It is cute, especially the frills and accessories. And... such situations are bound to happen from time to time, so it's good that you don't worry too much. Think that at least you aren't at risk of showing your underwear.

It's cute indeed! And... such a thing can happen to anyone, so you're right not to let it faze you! At least you have a lot of the embarrassment behind you already, so you can learn the game easier now, perhaps.

case.state: He's pulling his cock out!
Neptune, I accept the bet! ...Because I've just felt a rare craving for chocolate pudding...
Most of the obvious ones, like Nep-nep, Nepko, Nepsy, Nep-chan, are already taken... What about Nepurin?
Uhm, you surely know I meant the opposite, but let's assume I let it pass... Anyway, who do you imagine would peek under your dress? Certainly not Histoire or IF?
~Target~'s ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(don't|doesn't)~ matter...
Just your ~clothing~? That's not particularly funny.
At this point it's a shame to take them off... I'm sure that as a girl you know what I mean and you agree with me, ~player~.
At this point it's a shame to take them off... It feels strange to discuss this with a boy, but I'm sure you agree with me, ~player~.
Indeed, Neptune has got this small-furry-animal kind of cuteness, and apparently that's not the only similarity.
Hehe~ I've never been to a bar like this, but I already like it! At last I can count on someone else to provide all the fanservice!

state.text: Even though I'm a goddess and should have the others serve me, it's too often my role to provide the fanservice. I have nothing against your taking this role from me to~background.time~, Mari.

case.state: It's good to wear what you like, but how can you feel comfortable wearing a bikini top while everyone else is fully dressed? Do you perhaps live in a hot country, next to a beach?
Perhaps they keep asking you that because you're not part of any club. If you're tired of it, or of the reputation you've gotten, just choose a club that's close to your heart and join it.

If you're still undecided, maybe you should join a club that is on the brink of disbandment because of having too few members. It sounds like a typical anime plot, so maybe it'll lead to something fun in reality too.
Maybe ~player~ is slightly horny and perverted, but I'm not! I've just got bad luck with the cards!

I don't see how it'd be so dangerous, Kyou. ~Player~ might be slightly perverted, but ~player.subj~'s not someone who'd dare to make me take my panties off as soon as I lose a round. Having ~player.obj~ decide for me would be more fun for us both.

What do you mean, Kyou? ~Player~ has been very reliable in the past, and I'd have no problem promising to follow ~player.poss~ guidance. I'm sure ~player.subj~ wouldn't ask for anything unreasonable, and playing that way would be more fun both for ~player.obj~ and myself.
Uuu... You're right, Kyou. I have a feeling that if I had allowed ~player~ to decide, I'd have lost my panties waaay before my thigh-highs.
Umm... I imagined the game would be more fun for everyone if I let ~player~ decide for me, but you're right, Kyou. ~Player.subj~'d likely ask me to take off my panties way before my thigh-highs...
You're really leaving your hat on...? So be it, ~hu_tao~... Taking into account the rest of your clothes and your breast size... A silky black bra?
You're really leaving the hat on? Even though I'm a goddess, people rarely do what I ask them for... So thank you, hehe~ ...Now, what underwear would go well with those clothes... A lacy black bra?

It's a shame they didn't focus on you, but some business people only like to watch growing figures and can't appreciate music. I myself wish I could get more shares by singing and dancing on stage than by paperwork.
It's good to be confident, even though you're against much harder opponents to~background.time~. Do you play anything else apart from card games?
Well, obviously. But breasts come in various shapes and sizes... Take off that bra if you're going to instead of trying your hand at witticisms.
Maybe they just aren't used to seeing anyone with wings---artificial or natural... In my dimension, most people wouldn't as much as bat an eyelid...
At least you're not the only person in swimwear. Perhaps if everyone were wearing formal clothes, you'd feel slightly less comfortable. Where do you come from, by the way?
Well, you mentioned you were a navigator. If you spend the whole day on board a ship, maybe you start treating swimwear as normal clothes... Where exactly do you come from, by the way?
I like it! Maybe I could learn from your songs something that'll help me outperform Neptune and the others the next time we're on stage!
One and only? There is another Aqua right next to us. You can see by yourself that it's a human name.
Well, I asked because it sounds like a human name, and it'll make people wonder whether you're a goddess at all. We have another Aqua right here, and she'll surely agree.
You'll sound even cuter if you refer to yourself in the third person and end your sentences with "nyan"! "Noire's name is Noire nyan. Nice to meet you nyan." Ehehe~ What do you think... nyan?

I can teach you a special way to sound super cute! Say your name instead of "I" and end all sentences with "nyan"!"Noire's name is Noire nyan. Nice to meet you nyan." Ehehe~ How do you like it... nyan?
Woah, that's cool! I didn't expect I'd meet a real cat girl, especially here, of all places! Your cat collar is a bit strange, though... If that's not asking too much, could you meow for me?
Really!? Now I kind of wish I were part cat too! You even have a collar like a cat. Please, let me hear you meow!
A digital singer? What does it entail? And why, then, do you have a physical form?
That's difficult indeed. I still have stage fright before every performance.
Well, I'd do the same if I were you... Would you let me have a closer look at your clothes after the game?
I like it! I'm already the most talented among the goddesses, but maybe I could learn from your songs something to widen the gap even more!
I like your spirit, but don't you think that in this game risk is higher than the potential reward? Or are you actually that eager to see people naked?
I wonder about the stakes, though. Doesn't the embarrassment of stripping outweigh the benefit of being able to see others strip? Or do you actually care mostly about the latter?
You must have amassed quite a large army, then, if you endeavored something like that. So, did the rebellion succeed? If it failed, then you're lucky to be with us to~background.time~ unscathed.
That sounds like quite a large military operation, not something to venture with just a few soldiers. And what was the result?

No easier way!? I-I should be sailing from Lastation to Leanbox and back again! {vsmall}With ~player~ and Falcom, and 5-pb-chan, and...{!reset} And what to do if you do get irritated? Just for reference.
Why aren't you a believer? Haven't you seen your goddess help anyone?
You haven't seen any proof? Has the goddess shut herself in her room instead of doing her job or what?

state.text: I myself warped through a portal from another dimension, so maybe it's not that strange.
Well, portals like that and instantaneous travel take some time to get used to. I know something about that.

case.state: I don't see how you can guess it from my clothes, but yes, I do read manga... But I like more serious literature too. What are your poems like?
Yes, I do read manga, but it doesn't mean that's where I get ideas for my clothes from... I read more serious stuff too, so why don't you tell us more about your poems?

state.text: It's true some people have hobbies they prefer to hide...
Is it something that you have to hide from other people, then?

case.state: That's quite a long acquaintance... Forgive me if I'm being too direct, but... have you and ~player~ been... dating?
I don't like to ask direct questions like this, but... You and ~player~ haven't been dating, right!?

state.text: I do think you'd look cuter with longer hair, but maybe I'm biased, because your hairstyle would be a little like that of my sister... But now, what will you take off? Isn't it finally time for you to show us your underwear?
If you grew your hair a bit and dyed it black, you'd look a bit like my sister Uni. That look would be very cute too... But now, what will you strip? Will we finally see the color of your underwear?

case.state: My saying it didn't change the fact that everyone had noticed them long ago... The bra is matching, too! What a cute underwear set.
I only said it because everyone had noticed your panties long ago... But my, that's a very nice cutie-fruity set!

state.text: With your uniform? So with other clothes you often wear none? I guessed it!
Only with your uniform? So you often go without it when you're not at school?

case.state: So be it. I can't wait to see your cutest part... Is it even cuter than the rest of you?
Let us see the full view of your cuteness, then.
I know someone else who always wears a hat, but I don't think she does it for the same reasons as you... Where did that ghost come from?!
Blanc always wears a hat, too, but I doubt her reasons are similar to yours... Did you have a ghost in your shoe?
Neptune? You still had your shoes, socks, your D-pad hair clips...
You're correct, Neptune. It's totally time for your dress!
How come I'm losing to Neptune, who cannot even remember what clothes she's wearing... I bet she swaps her cards at random, too.
Neptune, for once I'm happy with your absent-mindedness.
The difference in LUK between Neptune and me is just overwhelming... She probably swaps her cards at random, too.

Existence of sentient robots makes a lot of difference. Most of them are goodhearted, if that's the right word, but I often have to fight the insurgent ones, and they're more dangerous than just armed humans.

I asked because it's a double-edged development. If your world---Mejare, was it?---enters that phase, you better prepare for changes, as some robots will become rebellious. I fight them often, and they're tougher enemies than most humans.

I don't condone violence, but if it's only the other pirates that you raid, one could say they had it coming. You still haven't told me your role, though. Do you fight with a saber or a gun, or are you perhaps a steerswoman?
If your words are to be believed, then honorable pirates do exist. Do you take part in the fights yourself or have only a supportive role?

As I thought! I'm known as Black Heart, the ruler of the Land of Black Regality. It's good to be among peers, even if we aren't playing the most dignified game possible. Can you tell me more about your country?

I was right! As Black Heart, the sovereign of the Land of Black Regality, I can recognize a fellow aristocrat... Tell me more about Brigid. I come from a different dimension, so I hope you'll forgive my complete lack of knowledge about your country.
Florina, it's only the first round. Just take off something small... Huh? Where did she run to? Is everything OK?
How, then, do you endure the knowledge that eventually your beauty will wither, and in the end you will become as those you bury?
So, do you acquiesce to the thought that the charms of your youth will eventually come to an end, and, one day, you will need a coffin and a funeral ceremony yourself?
Really? I'd love to help you! ...But don't imagine sewing is my hobby or something. I just suppose it'd be fun to make a costume and have someone wear it.
Great! In that case, let me help you! ...It's not that I'm particularly experienced at costume design and sewing, but I think I could do it pretty well if I ever tried...
(Somehow, transformations are always accompanied by strange light out of nowhere...... She's losing her wings and... Are those cat ears and a tail?)
(Somehow, transformations are always accompanied by strange light out of nowhere...... She's losing her wings and... becoming bulkier?)
What?! How can you say something like that, especially in front of all these men! Are you out of your mind!?
What?! {small}...B-But there are just girls here to~background.time~, so... are you going to search for a guy next, or...?{!reset}
What?! How can you say something like that, and so nonchalantly! {small}...A-And ~player~ is the only guy here to~background.time~...{!reset}

Hehe~ I see... In that case... I-I'm obviously glad to have a challenging opponent, and I'm going to win no matter what, but... Maybe you could sliiiightly alter your swapping strategy to make it more suitable for the present state of the game!
What?! How can you say something like that, without even keeping your voice down! {small}...~Opponent~ could likely hear you...{!reset}
So, true love leaves you with no regrets. That's romantic... But if desire or lust may keep someone a ghost, how can they satisfy it in that form?
I see. True love makes you feel no regrets... But if someone becomes a ghost because of their unfulfilled lust or desire, how can they assuage it afterwards?
You'd really do it...? Okay, we can play this game. A silky black bra?
Really? You'd do it for me, ~hu_tao~? ...Hehe~ Let me see... A lacy black bra?
Taking those off already? It's nice to move two steps closer to victory instead of one, but those socks are so cute that I wouldn't mind if you left them on for now.
Both your shoes and socks? It's good that I'm closing on the victory, but in this specific case, I'd rather you took off one item at a time.

I'm not what you call a god-mode character; my abilities have nothing to do with cheating or finding a way to break the game. I simply became a deity in my world. But do tell me about your experience.

I don't have game-balance-breaking abilities, so I'm not really a god-mode character. Though maybe I could be called so if I transformed into my Black Heart form... You've got my attention, so tell me more.

Right... Thank you for saying that. It's true that my LUK stat is very low. Judging from your experiences... or maybe you just know the values of your stats too... Do you think that your Luck might be far above the average?
True, poker isn't only about skills, and my LUK stat has always been very low... By the way, is your Luck so high in general, or have you just been very fortunate this game?
I'm familiar with the former, having been a playtester for several VR games myself, but what's the latter? Do you play those by moving and taking actions in the real world?
Do you mean the second type is a game you play by walking, talking and fighting in a reality that isn't just virtual? How exactly does it work?

state.text: Sometimes, you're even annoyed? It's true, then, that love is both bitter and sweet... Surely, there are some really sweet moments too?

case.state: It must be great to have someone you can count on and who won't betray you. But does it feel very different, then, to being together with a sibling or other member of your close family?

state.text: You certainly have that subtle younger-sister aura around you. But why did you two choose such different walks of life? Is there any reason you didn't want to be a knight?
That explains why your look so very sisterly. Why did you two choose such different vocations, though? Didn't you want to follow in your sister's footsteps?

case.state: Miniaturization is a question of time, then. But do you think it would actually help humans in your world? It's surely been a boon in my dimension, in battles against monsters, but robots and criminals make use of technological progress too.

Now you sound like my sister Uni! She loves talking about the charm of antique firearms and assumes that everyone else understands it too. In response, most people just nod and feign comprehension, but you would agree with her, wouldn't you? I feel the same about collecting swords.

You're fortunate not to have them---they're impressive creatures but hostile and quite tough~! ...And did you take part in that battle yourself, ~jim~? Surely it wasn't just something you read about in a history book?
They make everyone's gaze focus even more on your forearms...... What's the victory that you're the most proud of, ~jim~?

Depending on what you were rebelling against, you may have been the good or the bad guys---though you'll surely say you were the former. So why aren't you rebels anymore? Did your group change its allegiance?
I do slay dragons quite often... though maybe I don't look like it right now. Did you fight in that battle yourself?
Well, fashion and art don't need to have a definite meaning. What victory are you the most proud of?
You talk about it so fondly... Did you actually choose it because you think it's cool and wouldn't exchange it even for something much more advanced?

You must be quite confident in your shooting skills to carry a collector's gun instead of something newer. I too sometimes choose my swords based on how much I like them and how cool they look, so we aren't that different!
Hehe~ Thank you. Black is the best, but adding some colors is okay too... You're very cute, Blake, so why don't you smile more and act more confident? This game may be a good opportunity to try it.

Thank you, Blake~... You're nicer and cuter than you probably think, so you don't have to act so reserved. It's true this is a silly game, but no one will tell you to do anything you're uncomfortable with.
Then, what are your---actually, never mind... You're probably just a pervert, but... I-Is sex really that good? ...And that tiring? How long does it normally take?

state.text: {small}It'd only be proper if you did it with the one person you love the most in the world......{!reset} W-What is your favorite instrument? I like the guitar. It looks and sounds cool.

case.state: Hehe~ Thank you for appreciating the design! This outfit isn't that technologically advanced. I'm sure all the materials can be found here too, so you can make a similar one for yourself and bring this style onto your city's streets!

It's true I don't normally play games like this, but not because I care about sins or stuff like that. You're free to do whatever you want as long as you don't harm the others. And you shouldn't humble yourself. I was a mortal too before I attained to godhood.
I don't look the part? A goddess's power depends on her shares, which measure how strongly people believe in her and how popular she is, so multiplayer games and being an idol make perfect sense.
I-It's good that you understand... Though most people worship me because of how well I rule and protect my country... I guess so, at least.

I'll gain your shares, and our hearts will connect if you just put your trust in my ability to protect you and make you happy. There are no prescribed rites, so all ways of showing your devotion are welcome.
It must be great to have so many friends and get stuck together for days. They can't ignore you if the ship is so small. How do you spend your time with them apart from... navigating?
Being stuck on the sea doesn't sound bad if you're with your friends. But don't they interrupt your work as a... navigator?

Hm, I thought that someone who once tried flying would prefer it to anything else. What exactly didn't you like about it, Nami? Do you simply dislike heights, or was there a problem with how the ship was piloted?
Huh, you tried and didn't like it? I wouldn't expect someone as confident as you to be uncomfortable with flying. Did the ship fly too high, or was the acceleration too fast, maybe?
Just hope might not be enough. In a game like this, it's not a shame for a newcomer to be treated a bit differently than expert gamers. I appreciate your fighting spirit and sportsmanship, though.
Well... I like how fair you're playing, Hilda, but it's okay to accept a little bit of handicap if you're new to the game.

Lowee is the oldest country in Gamindustri, and it has the greatest population of the elderly. It produces a lot of video games targeted at a casual player, which are popular among children, too... Are you listening to me, ~aiopp~?

What are dogoos? Slimy creatures with some canine features: Part dog, part goo. Usually, they're cute and do almost no harm aside from shamelessly licking people, but they're able to merge to form larger and stronger ones. There are dogoos with slimy tentacles too, which are much more dangerous.

If goddesses such as Vert and me ruled Earth, it could become a very peaceful place. Don't you agree, ~player~? There are no creatures as powerful as dragons, phoenixes, or flying whales here, and machines and robots are so primitive that they present no danger either.

Each country in Gamindustri has its specialty foods, chosen by the goddesses. Maybe you've heard about Planeptune's pudding, Lowee's manjuu, Leanbox's mushrooms, and Lastation's curry. I cook fine curry myself... but don't imagine I'll ever cook for you, ~player~.

Where Vert gets her tea from? I doubt all the varieties she drinks are grown in Leanbox. Could it be she actually imports it from other worlds? Maybe even from Earth? Using transdimensional portals just to buy tea seems like a waste of share energy to me, but I know her well enough not to be surprised if it's true.

Neptune is pretty skilled with her katana, but her fighting style is wild and strength-based. I much prefer to watch Nepgear's moves, which are more dance-like and elegant. Maybe she learned that by observing me?

Apparently, Neptune stays slim despite eating so much pudding and snacks by transforming repeatedly into and out of her Hard Drive Divinity form. It does burn calories faster than normal workout, but is uses up a lot of share energy too. She's unbelievably irresponsible.

What are dogoos? Part dog, part goo, as the name implies. They're cute and almost harmless apart from shamelessly licking people, but if there are many, they may merge and form a giant one. If you ever visit Gamindustri and stumble upon them, you better be careful, ~aiopp~. Especially around the tentacled ones.
I wonder if Unimites the demon king still has followers who sell his keyholders, posters and fashion accessories... Or was it Uminites...?
